MESSAGE.JP: くですずめが鳴いている…。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear sparrows chirping in the distance...
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear sparrows chirping in the distance...

MESSAGE.JP: う…眠い…。
真人@「朝飯いこうぜ」
理樹@「そうだね…」
欲湧かないけど、僕は普段通りの行動をしないと…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't really hungry, but I needed to keep up my normal routine...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't really hungry, but I needed to keep up my normal routine...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「さて、今日は土曜日だ」
理樹@「うん」
以外は何をわかりきったことを、という目で恭介を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone besides me glared at Kyousuke as if he'd said something overly obvious.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone besides me glared at Kyousuke as if he'd said something overly obvious.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「授業は午前で終わり。午後からは、目一杯メンバー探しができるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Classes will be over at noon. We can go all out to find members this afternoon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Classes will be over at noon. We can go all out to find members this afternoon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は目一杯無視する。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone did their best to ignore him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone did their best to ignore him.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「理樹、好きだぜ」
然そんなことを言われたら…面食らう。
MESSAGE.EN: His sudden words broke my composure and I turned to look at him.
MESSAGE.Translation: His sudden words broke my composure and I turned to look at him.

MESSAGE.JP: 日僕は朱鷺戸さんに、恭介が好きだって答えている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Yesterday, I told Tokido-san that I love Kyousuke...
MESSAGE.Translation: Yesterday, I told Tokido-san that I love Kyousuke...

MESSAGE.JP: れは…
思い!?
日僕は朱鷺戸さんに、恭介が大好きだって答えている…。
MESSAGE.EN: Yesterday, I told Tokido-san that I really love Kyousuke...
MESSAGE.Translation: Yesterday, I told Tokido-san that I really love Kyousuke...

MESSAGE.JP: れは…
思い!?
然そんなことを言われたら…面食らう。
MESSAGE.EN: His sudden words broke my composure and I turned to look at him.
MESSAGE.Translation: His sudden words broke my composure and I turned to look at him.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「さすがは理樹だ。理樹はすげぇな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝As expected of you. You're amazing, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝As expected of you. You're amazing, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「見習えよ、みんなも」
れられたことに気づく…。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized that I'd fallen into his trap...
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized that I'd fallen into his trap...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人っ、好きだよっ」
真人@「え、マジかよっ…」
理樹@「さすがは真人。すごいな真人は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝As expected of you. Masato, you're amazing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝As expected of you. Masato, you're amazing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなメンバー探しに熱心なんてね、大好きだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Being so eager about looking for members, I absolutely love you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Being so eager about looking for members, I absolutely love you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「謙吾、好きだぜっ」
謙吾@「俺は嫌いだ」
真人@「ぬおぉ…」
鈴@「男に振られてきしょい奴だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Dumped by a guy... you creep me out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Dumped by a guy... you creep me out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「悪いな、鈴…実は鈴のほうが好きなんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sorry, Rin... Actually, I love you even more...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sorry, Rin... Actually, I love you even more...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「きしょいっ、寄ってくんなっ」
真人@「さすがだなぁ、鈴は…」
鈴@「きしょいから話しかけるな！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm saying that's creepy, don't talk to me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm saying that's creepy, don't talk to me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人と僕だけで頑張らなくてはいけないらしい…。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like Masato and I will be the only ones looking for members...
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like Masato and I will be the only ones looking for members...

MESSAGE.JP: 段の途中。
枝さんを見かけた。
理樹@（あれ…？）
している相手は…。
三枝@「…それで、どうかなと思ったんだけど」
三枝@「だめ、かな…」
二木@「…私に良いか悪いか言う権限はないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I don't have the authority to say one way or the other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I don't have the authority to say one way or the other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「…そ、そうなんだけど、でも、一応、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...oh, I see. But just in case...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...oh, I see. But just in case...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 二木@「……ふぅ」
三枝@「訊いておこうと思ったんだ」
二木@「好きにすれば？」
三枝@「え、いいの…？」
二木@「いいか悪いかを許可するのは私じゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I'm not the one you should be asking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I'm not the one you should be asking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「う、うん…」
二木@「同好会設立の届け出は文化部会に出せばいいでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝Notification of the founding of such groups should be presented at the cultural clubs' meeting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝Notification of the founding of such groups should be presented at the cultural clubs' meeting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「うん…」
二木@「…風紀委員会顧問の遠藤先生には私が話しておくから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...I'll talk to Endou-sensei, the advisor for the disciplinary committee.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...I'll talk to Endou-sensei, the advisor for the disciplinary committee.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ほんと？」
二木@「…もういいでしょ？　用事あるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝...Are we done here? I have things to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝...Are we done here? I have things to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「う、うん。ごめんなさい…」
二木@「……ふん」
三枝@「ふぅ…」
理樹@「三枝さん」
三枝@「あ、理樹くん。どうしたの？」
に気がついた三枝さんは、いつもの調子だった。
MESSAGE.EN: When she noticed me, she returned to her normal self.
MESSAGE.Translation: When she noticed me, she returned to her normal self.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さっきのって風紀委員長だよね」
三枝@「そうだよ」
理樹@「何を頼んでたの？」
三枝@「うん。整備委員会がこの春、無くなったこと知ってる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Yeah. Did you know the maintenance committee was disbanded this spring?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Yeah. Did you know the maintenance committee was disbanded this spring?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだっけ？」
三枝@「風紀委員会に統合されたんだよ。でもねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It was integrated into the disciplinary committee. But you know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It was integrated into the disciplinary committee. But you know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「仕事多いから、小さな雑事は後回しにされがちでさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It's a lot of work, so much of the small stuff is being overlooked.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It's a lot of work, so much of the small stuff is being overlooked.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ボランティア部もいろいろやってるみたいなんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It seems like the volunteer clubs have been helping with a lot of the work too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It seems like the volunteer clubs have been helping with a lot of the work too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「私は、整備委員会っぽい部活があったらいいなーと思ったわけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I thought it'd be nice to have a club that did something like what the maintenance committee used to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I thought it'd be nice to have a club that did something like what the maintenance committee used to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: から同好会うんぬん、の話をしていたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: So that's why they were talking about that.
MESSAGE.Translation: So that's why they were talking about that.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「それで、風紀委員長にお伺いを立ててみたのですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝So I asked the head prefect for advice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝So I asked the head prefect for advice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なるほどね」
三枝@「そんな感じ」
三枝@「じゃ、準備があるから。ばいばい、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Well, I need to get ready so bye bye, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Well, I need to get ready so bye bye, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、大変そうだけど頑張ってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, it sounds tough, so good luck.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, it sounds tough, so good luck.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は三枝さんと別れた。
理樹@「おはよう」
クド@「直枝さん、おはようございます」
三枝@「理樹くん、おそーい」
三枝@「遅刻しちゃうよ」
理樹@「三枝さんこそ、自分のクラスに戻らなくていいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about you, Saigusa-san, is it okay not returning to your own classroom?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about you, Saigusa-san, is it okay not returning to your own classroom?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 計の針は間もなく、予鈴の時間を指す。
MESSAGE.EN: According to the clock it was just about time for class to start.
MESSAGE.Translation: According to the clock it was just about time for class to start.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「あー、ひどい。理樹くんが仲間ハズレにするよぉっ」
理樹@「仲間はずれも何も、違うクラスなんだから戻らないとまずいでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ostracized or not, you're still in a different class and should get back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ostracized or not, you're still in a different class and should get back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「えーいいじゃん。別にサ、ＨＲは自分のクラスで受けなきゃいけない、なんて校則はないよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Eh, it's fine. There's no particular rule that says you have to attend your own homeroom!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Eh, it's fine. There's no particular rule that says you have to attend your own homeroom!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは常識的過ぎて、わざわざ書かないだけだと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's common sense, so no one bothered writing one down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's common sense, so no one bothered writing one down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「遅刻はいけないと思いますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I think it's bad to be late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I think it's bad to be late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「うわ、クド公にまで説教されてしまった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Whoa, I've even been lectured by Little Kud...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Whoa, I've even been lectured by Little Kud...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「なんか四面楚歌って感じ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Has the whole world turned against me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Has the whole world turned against me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぜそこで楽しそうなんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason she looked pleased with herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason she looked pleased with herself.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「よぉーし、こうなったら唯ねえを呼ぶしかないなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝All right, if it's come to this, I can only turn to Yui-nee.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝All right, if it's come to this, I can only turn to Yui-nee.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、なんでそこでそうなるのかわからないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I don't really see what she's got to do with this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I don't really see what she's got to do with this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: うや否や、来ヶ谷さんの席のほうへ手を掲げる。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as she'd said it, she raised her hand turning to Kurugaya-san's seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as she'd said it, she raised her hand turning to Kurugaya-san's seat.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「姉御ーっ、理樹くんがー」
三枝@「っていねぇーっ!!」
来ヶ谷さんの席はもぬけの殻で、ハードカバーの本が机の上においてあるだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The seat was empty, only a book was left on the desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The seat was empty, only a book was left on the desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「この上げた左手はどうすればいいのっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝What do I do with my raised left hand now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝What do I do with my raised left hand now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「下ろせばいいと思うよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think you can just put it down...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think you can just put it down...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「うーん…唯ねえどうするんだろ、遅刻しちゃうじゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Hm... What's she up to, she'll be late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Hm... What's she up to, she'll be late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、わかってるんだねその辺は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, so you do understand the concept.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, so you do understand the concept.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「仕方ないナァ、わたしが唯ねえの代わりに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Can't be helped, I'll have to take her place...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Can't be helped, I'll have to take her place...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんの席に座る。
三枝@「これでバッチリじゃない？」
三枝@「よし…少年、とりあえずアヒョーとかうひゃーとか叫んで私を楽しませてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝All right... Young man, you can start by shouting something like ❛ahyo❜ or ❛uhya❜ to entertain me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝All right... Young man, you can start by shouting something like ❛ahyo❜ or ❛uhya❜ to entertain me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ノマネを始めた…。
理樹@「いや、やらないけど…」
三枝@「なに？　仕方ない、この私自らアヒョーとかうひゃーとか叫んで楽しもう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝What? I've got no choice, I'll shout ❛ahyo❜ or ❛uhya❜ and entertain myself, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝What? I've got no choice, I'll shout ❛ahyo❜ or ❛uhya❜ and entertain myself, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「アヒョーっ!!　うひゃーっ!!」
三枝@「ふう…姉御ともあろうこの私が、思わず全力で楽しんでしまった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Phew... Filling in for her, and I end up enjoying it to the fullest myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Phew... Filling in for her, and I end up enjoying it to the fullest myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「楽しそうだな」
三枝@「うむ、楽しい。なぜなら私のおっぱいはぼいんぼいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Yep, I am. That's because my breasts go all boing-boing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Yep, I am. That's because my breasts go all boing-boing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「いや、どうみてもそれほどではないが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No, no matter how you look at them, they aren't that impressive.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No, no matter how you look at them, they aren't that impressive.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「って…」
音もなく来ヶ谷さんが現れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Without a sound, Kurugaya-san made her appearance.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Without a sound, Kurugaya-san made her appearance.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「あ、ありゃ、姉御」
来ヶ谷@「人の席の周りで何の騒ぎだ、これは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What kind of ruckus are you making in my seat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What kind of ruckus are you making in my seat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「お席を温めておいてござるっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I am merely keeping it warm for you～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I am merely keeping it warm for you～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「うむ、迷惑だ」
三枝@「えー、だって理樹くんが『帰れ！』って私をいじめるんですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Eh, but Riki-kun was bullying me to get out of here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Eh, but Riki-kun was bullying me to get out of here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょっと待って、僕は遅刻するからって言っただけだってば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hold on, I just meant you'd be late otherwise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hold on, I just meant you'd be late otherwise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「直枝さんがそんなことを言ったですか!?」
理樹@「クドまで誤解しちゃったじゃないかっ」
来ヶ谷@「いいだろう別に。Ｍっ気のある理樹君には朝から嬉しいイベントじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Isn't it fine. For a masochist like Riki-kun, that's a delightful event first thing in the morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Isn't it fine. For a masochist like Riki-kun, that's a delightful event first thing in the morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな気ないからっ!!　皆無だからっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm no masochist!! Not the tiniest bit!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm no masochist!! Not the tiniest bit!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「お、理樹すげぇな。朝っぱらから両上腕二頭筋に花か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, that's awesome, Riki. You've got a flower on both biceps brachii muscles first thing in the morning?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, that's awesome, Riki. You've got a flower on both biceps brachii muscles first thing in the morning?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやだよ、そんな不気味な状態…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No way, I don't ever want to be in such a creepy situation...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No way, I don't ever want to be in such a creepy situation...❞

MESSAGE.JP: つも通りのにぎやかな朝。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the usual rowdy morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the usual rowdy morning.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が鳴る。
三枝@「理樹くんがかまってくれないから、帰る～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Riki-kun doesn't care about me, so I'm going back...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Riki-kun doesn't care about me, so I'm going back...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自然なほどにしょんぼりとうなだれた三枝さん。
室を出て行くときにちらと僕と視線があった。
MESSAGE.EN: As she was about to leave the classroom she looked at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: As she was about to leave the classroom she looked at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 、手を振ってるし。僕は仕方なしに振り返してあげた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was waving her hand. I had no other choice but to wave back.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was waving her hand. I had no other choice but to wave back.

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんはウィンクすると、そのまま去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She winked at me and disappeared from sight.
MESSAGE.Translation: She winked at me and disappeared from sight.

MESSAGE.JP: れやれ、しょうがない子だなぁ…。
と、辺りを見渡す。
学期を迎えて、一ヶ月。
MESSAGE.EN: It was already one month into the new term.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was already one month into the new term.

MESSAGE.JP: だどこか浮ついた雰囲気が教室を支配していた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was still an air of irreverence in the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was still an air of irreverence in the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 自身、例外じゃない。
しいクラスになって、新生リトルバスターズが始まった。
MESSAGE.EN: A new class meant a fresh start for the Little Busters.
MESSAGE.Translation: A new class meant a fresh start for the Little Busters.

MESSAGE.JP: わがしい毎日が続く。僕たちは変わりながらも続いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Those rambunctious days were still with us. Although we were changing, we were still going strong.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those rambunctious days were still with us. Although we were changing, we were still going strong.

MESSAGE.JP: と、教室の廊下側の席――西園さんの席に目が向く。
MESSAGE.EN: I shifted my gaze to a seat near the hallway, Nishizono-san's seat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shifted my gaze to a seat near the hallway, Nishizono-san's seat.

MESSAGE.JP: とり、真剣に教師の話を聞いている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was the only one listening to the teacher with any seriousness.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was the only one listening to the teacher with any seriousness.

MESSAGE.JP: が来た時には、もうあそこに座っていただろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: When I had entered, she was already sitting down.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I had entered, she was already sitting down.

MESSAGE.JP: れまでに、僕はあの席に目をやったことがあっただろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if I've ever looked over there before now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if I've ever looked over there before now.

MESSAGE.JP: はよう、と挨拶したことはあっただろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if I've ever told her ❛Good morning.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if I've ever told her ❛Good morning.❜

MESSAGE.JP: つも日傘を差している、ちょっと変わった子。
MESSAGE.EN: Always holding a parasol, she was such a strange girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: Always holding a parasol, she was such a strange girl.

MESSAGE.JP: の悪い生徒は、西園さんのことを『カゲナシ』と呼んでいることを僕は知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: I knew that some students were sarcastically calling her ❛No shadow.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew that some students were sarcastically calling her ❛No shadow.❜

MESSAGE.JP: とつ。
在感がない。影が薄くて居るか居ないか分からない。
MESSAGE.EN: She had no presence. It wasn't clear whether she even cast a faint shadow or not.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had no presence. It wasn't clear whether she even cast a faint shadow or not.

MESSAGE.JP: ばたの石ころのように、誰にも気にされない存在。
MESSAGE.EN: She was like a pebble by the roadside; everyone was indifferent to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was like a pebble by the roadside; everyone was indifferent to her.

MESSAGE.JP: こで、何をしているのか。誰も知らないし、興味もない。
MESSAGE.EN: Where she was and what she was doing, nobody knew, and no one was interested.
MESSAGE.Translation: Where she was and what she was doing, nobody knew, and no one was interested.

MESSAGE.JP: っても何の役にも立たない。せいぜい蹴飛ばして遊ぶくらい。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if there were such a pebble, it would serve no purpose whatsoever. At the very best, one could kick it around to kill time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if there were such a pebble, it would serve no purpose whatsoever. At the very best, one could kick it around to kill time.

MESSAGE.JP: くても誰も困らない。せいぜい憂さ晴らしができなくてがっかりするくらい。
MESSAGE.EN: No one would be troubled even if it weren't there. At the very most, one would get frustrated being unable to vent one's boredom by kicking it around.
MESSAGE.Translation: No one would be troubled even if it weren't there. At the very most, one would get frustrated being unable to vent one's boredom by kicking it around.

MESSAGE.JP: いどころか、ないような影。
MESSAGE.EN: Such a faint shadow, it's like she had none at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Such a faint shadow, it's like she had none at all.

MESSAGE.JP: から、カゲナシ。
う、ひとつ。
園さんは、外ではいつも日傘を差している。
MESSAGE.EN: When she was outside, she'd always take the parasol with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: When she was outside, she'd always take the parasol with her.

MESSAGE.JP: けば、入学した時からずっとだという。
MESSAGE.EN: They say she's been like that since entering school.
MESSAGE.Translation: They say she's been like that since entering school.

MESSAGE.JP: だるような夏の日はもちろん、穏やかな春の日も、涼やかな秋の日も、震えるような冬の日も。
MESSAGE.EN: On a sultry summer day, as well as a mild spring day, or a refreshing autumn day, and even on a freezing winter day.
MESSAGE.Translation: On a sultry summer day, as well as a mild spring day, or a refreshing autumn day, and even on a freezing winter day.

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんは日傘を手放さない。
MESSAGE.EN: She would never part with her parasol.
MESSAGE.Translation: She would never part with her parasol.

MESSAGE.JP: が弱いのだろう、という話だけど詳しいところは誰も知らない。
MESSAGE.EN: There is talk that she has very delicate skin, but no one knows the truth.
MESSAGE.Translation: There is talk that she has very delicate skin, but no one knows the truth.

MESSAGE.JP: 白の体を陽にさらすこともなく、その足下にある影はいつも傘のものだけ。
MESSAGE.EN: She never exposed her fair skin to the sun, and beneath her feet there was always only the shadow of the parasol.
MESSAGE.Translation: She never exposed her fair skin to the sun, and beneath her feet there was always only the shadow of the parasol.

MESSAGE.JP: から、カゲナシ。
園さんは、影さえも隣に居ないほど孤独なんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Was she such a solitary existence that she hadn't even a shadow beside her?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was she such a solitary existence that she hadn't even a shadow beside her?

MESSAGE.JP: 教師@「じゃあ、今日はここまで」
生徒@「きりーつ」
号令が終わると、とたんに生き返ったようになる教室。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Just as soon as class came to an end, the classroom sprung back into life.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Just as soon as class came to an end, the classroom sprung back into life.

MESSAGE.JP: れで授業が終わったことを知る。
MESSAGE.EN: With that, I knew class was over.
MESSAGE.Translation: With that, I knew class was over.

MESSAGE.JP: こからは起きて、平然を装いながら、目を光らせてなければならない。
MESSAGE.EN: Now I need to be alert, stay calm, and keep an eye out for trouble.
MESSAGE.Translation: Now I need to be alert, stay calm, and keep an eye out for trouble.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふんふんふ～ん♪」
直の小毬さんが前に出ると、黒板を消し始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san, being on day duty, began cleaning the blackboard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san, being on day duty, began cleaning the blackboard.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ららら～」
小毬@「ら？」
毬さんの手が止まる。
の方に手が届かないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like she couldn't reach the top.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like she couldn't reach the top.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ん～～っ」
伸びしてみるが、それでも届かないようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood on tiptoes but still couldn't reach.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood on tiptoes but still couldn't reach.

MESSAGE.JP: 手伝ってあげよう。
に行こうとすると。
小毬@「うーん…」
小毬@「えいっ」
ょん。
ごっ。
小毬@「ほわあっ!!」
ャンプしたはいいが、勢い余って黒板に激突した!!
MESSAGE.EN: She tried to jump, but put too much strength into it, crashing into the blackboard.
MESSAGE.Translation: She tried to jump, but put too much strength into it, crashing into the blackboard.

MESSAGE.JP: たたっ!!
んっ!!
らに着地にも失敗して教卓に頭を打っていた!!
MESSAGE.EN: Furthermore, she blew the landing, banging her head on the teacher's desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Furthermore, she blew the landing, banging her head on the teacher's desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわっ、ちょっと、だいじょうぶ!?」
んだなんだ、とクラス中の注目が集まる。
MESSAGE.EN: The whole classroom turned their attention to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: The whole classroom turned their attention to us.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「い、いたい～」
生徒@「だ、大丈夫神北さん？」
人かのクラスメイトが、心配そうに声を掛ける。
MESSAGE.EN: A few worried classmates were voicing their concern.
MESSAGE.Translation: A few worried classmates were voicing their concern.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「う、うん…痛いけどへいき～」
あんまり平気じゃなさそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It didn't really sound like she was okay at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It didn't really sound like she was okay at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あんまり無理しちゃダメだよ。言ってくれれば僕も手伝うからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You shouldn't push yourself so hard. If you asked me, I would've helped.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You shouldn't push yourself so hard. If you asked me, I would've helped.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ご、ごめんなさい～」
小毬@「はぁ…また失敗ばっかりになってしまった…しょんぼり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Haa... I messed up again... So heartbreaking...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Haa... I messed up again... So heartbreaking...❞

MESSAGE.JP: め息をひとつ吐く。
MESSAGE.EN: She let out a big sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: She let out a big sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれ、鈴」
が無言で黒板の前に来ると、黒板消しをひとつ、手に取る。
MESSAGE.EN: She approached the blackboard in silence, and picked up an eraser.
MESSAGE.Translation: She approached the blackboard in silence, and picked up an eraser.

MESSAGE.JP: して、その手を伸ばしてジャンプし、残った文字を消していく。
MESSAGE.EN: Holding it up, she made a jump and swiftly erased the remaining letters.
MESSAGE.Translation: Holding it up, she made a jump and swiftly erased the remaining letters.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「あ…りんちゃん、ありがと～」
鈴@「どってことない。困ったらいつでも言ってくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No problem. Let me know when you're in trouble.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No problem. Let me know when you're in trouble.❞

MESSAGE.JP: お…鈴が頼もしく見える…。
小毬@「うんっ、ありがとーっ」
毬さんが鈴の両手を取る。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san held both of Rin's hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san held both of Rin's hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「らんらんらーん♪」
躍り始めた小毬さんに、さすがに逃げ出した…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...As expected, she fled once Komari-san began jumping with excitement.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...As expected, she fled once Komari-san began jumping with excitement.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「が、がーん…逃げられちゃった…」
理樹@「いや、さすがにそこまで望むのは難しいんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I guess we shouldn't expect too much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I guess we shouldn't expect too much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「クーちゃんなら一緒にくるくる回ってくれるのになぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Kuu-chan would definitely dance around with me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Kuu-chan would definitely dance around with me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「しょんぼり…」
ドは振り回されているだけの気もする。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud certainly seemed to be always getting twirled around.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud certainly seemed to be always getting twirled around.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「でも、うれしいな」
理樹@「え？」
小毬@「手伝ってくれたから～」
理樹@「…うん」
んだか、ふたりはだいぶ打ち解けてきているように思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt they had opened up to one other somewhat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt they had opened up to one other somewhat.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「えへへ、今度なにかお礼しよっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ehehe, I should do something this time to show my gratitude.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ehehe, I should do something this time to show my gratitude.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね、そうしてあげてよ」
がそこまでになる望みは薄いけど、いつかは小毬さんとくるくる回れるほど、なかよしになる日が来るのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: It was probably too much to hope for, but maybe the day would come when Rin would be twirling around with Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was probably too much to hope for, but maybe the day would come when Rin would be twirling around with Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: はちりん、とひとつ鈴の音を立てると、そのまま廊下へ走っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: The bell on her head chimed as she dashed off into the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bell on her head chimed as she dashed off into the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「が、がーん…また逃げられちゃった…」
理樹@「…いや、鈴は照れくさいだけなんだよ、きっと」
小毬@「う、うーん？」
理樹@「慣れてないからさ、こういうの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's not used to this kind of thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's not used to this kind of thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うーん、そうなのか～」
小毬@「でも、ちょっとうれしいな」
理樹@「え？」
小毬@「手伝ってくれたから～」
理樹@「…うん」
れは、鈴なりの努力なのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess Rin was putting some effort into it, in her own way.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess Rin was putting some effort into it, in her own way.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「えへへ、今度なにかお礼しよっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ehehe, I should do something this time to show my gratitude.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ehehe, I should do something this time to show my gratitude.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね、そうしてあげてよ」
毬さんも色々不器用だけど、このひとなら鈴の人見知りの性格を、変えてくれるかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: If it was Komari-san, perhaps she would in her own clumsy way manage to change Rin's shyness.
MESSAGE.Translation: If it was Komari-san, perhaps she would in her own clumsy way manage to change Rin's shyness.

MESSAGE.JP: て、その鈴はどこに行ってしまったのだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: Now then, where did Rin go?
MESSAGE.Translation: Now then, where did Rin go?

MESSAGE.JP: うだ…鈴は課題をまたひとつ達成した。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right... She had completed another task after all.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right... She had completed another task after all.

MESSAGE.JP: らば、次の課題が届いているはずだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That being the case, another one might have arrived.
MESSAGE.Translation: That being the case, another one might have arrived.

MESSAGE.JP: り廊下へ向かう。
が猫たちと話をしている。
MESSAGE.EN: There she was talking to her cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: There she was talking to her cats.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こら、ダメだろ」
ゃー！
は廊下の柱にまとわりついていた猫をひっぺがした。
MESSAGE.EN: She was tugging at a cat that was clinging onto a column in the passageway.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was tugging at a cat that was clinging onto a column in the passageway.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「爪折れちゃうと大変だろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It'll be awful if you break your claws.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It'll be awful if you break your claws.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「爪研ぎは中庭の樹とかにしろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Go sharpen your claws on a tree in the courtyard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Go sharpen your claws on a tree in the courtyard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃにゃ。
を両手で持ち上げた鈴はそっと下ろす。
MESSAGE.EN: She gently placed the cat back onto the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: She gently placed the cat back onto the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「めっ」
差し指を立てて叱る。
MESSAGE.EN: She extended her index finger and scolded the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: She extended her index finger and scolded the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「わかったか？」
ゃう。
られた猫はちょっとしょんぼりしているように見える。
MESSAGE.EN: The scolded cat seemed somewhat downhearted.
MESSAGE.Translation: The scolded cat seemed somewhat downhearted.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「もう行っていいぞ」
ゃー。
鈴@「なんだ。遊んでほしいのか？」
ゃう。
鈴@「甘えてもダメだ」
ゃーー。
鈴@「ダメだ…」
ゃーーーー。
鈴@「…ダメだけどしょーがないな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I can't, but I have no choice...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I can't, but I have no choice...❞

MESSAGE.JP: っ！
鈴@「お？　おまえの耳、なんか変わったな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Huh? Your ear looks a bit odd...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Huh? Your ear looks a bit odd...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「右に倒せなかっただろ。前」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Isn't it kinda bent to the right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Isn't it kinda bent to the right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「練習したのか？」
ゃぉ。
鈴@「おー。えらいな。練習は大事だ」
ゃあ。
鈴@「そうだな。次は耳でアクロバット飛行を見せてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay. Show me how you do aerobatics with your ears next time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay. Show me how you do aerobatics with your ears next time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理だからそれ。
鈴@「…こら、柱に昇るなっ！」
が一匹に構っている間に他の猫たちがわらわらと柱に群がる。
MESSAGE.EN: While she was occupied with one of the cats, others had started swarming around the column.
MESSAGE.Translation: While she was occupied with one of the cats, others had started swarming around the column.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「わぷっ！　尻尾振るなっ尻尾の樹みたいだろっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wapu! Don't swing your tail, it's like a tree branch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wapu! Don't swing your tail, it's like a tree branch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おりろっ」
匹一匹捕まえては丁寧に地面に下ろす鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She was catching them one by one, carefully placing them on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was catching them one by one, carefully placing them on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こういうときだけどうして言うこときかないんだおまえたちは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why is it at times like this that you won't listen to me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why is it at times like this that you won't listen to me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「尻尾まみれになるところだった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You were about to get your tail dirty...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You were about to get your tail dirty...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「って、尻尾？」
は小首をかしげた。
うやら次の課題が届いたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like the next task had arrived.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like the next task had arrived.

MESSAGE.JP: は紙切れを猫の尻尾から引き抜き、中を開いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She took the scrap of paper from the cat's tail and unfolded it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took the scrap of paper from the cat's tail and unfolded it.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…みぎみぎひだりみぎみぎひだりっ」
庭の一角を占める猫の群れ。
MESSAGE.EN: A swarm of cats had gathered in one corner of the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: A swarm of cats had gathered in one corner of the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ちがう、そこは右っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wrong, it should be a right, there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wrong, it should be a right, there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（なにしてるんだろ？）
て膝をついた鈴は猫じゃらしを振ってみせているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was sitting on one knee, and swinging around a stalk of bristlegrass.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was sitting on one knee, and swinging around a stalk of bristlegrass.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「もっかいいくぞ」
鈴@「みぎみぎひだりみぎひだりみぎっ」
ゃーにゃー。
が左右に振る猫じゃらしにあわせて猫たちが動く。
MESSAGE.EN: The cats followed along with the bristlegrass' motion.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cats followed along with the bristlegrass' motion.

MESSAGE.JP: にゃー。
てん。
鈴@「ひっかかったらだめだろ、おまえ」
後だけ方向を入れ替えたせいか、しましま猫がひっくり返った。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps because she changed direction in the end, the striped cat tumbled over.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps because she changed direction in the end, the striped cat tumbled over.

MESSAGE.JP: ゃー。ごろごろ。
鈴@「そしてもーどーでもよくなってるだろ…」
鈴@「あっ！」
ゃー！
匹が鈴の手から猫じゃらしをかっさらった。
MESSAGE.EN: One of them snatched the bristlegrass away from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: One of them snatched the bristlegrass away from her.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「な、なんだやるきかー！」
鈴@「しゅっしゅ」
右左右左右アッパー。
MESSAGE.EN: Right, right, left, right, left, and a right uppercut.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right, right, left, right, left, and a right uppercut.

MESSAGE.JP: ゃーにゃー。
にゃー。
てん。さっきの猫がまたひっくり返った。
鈴@「…おまえらに学習能力はないのか…」
なうな。ごろごろ。
鈴@「やっぱりどーでもよくなってるんだろ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You don't care at all anymore, after all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You don't care at all anymore, after all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は腰に両手をあててため息をついた。
MESSAGE.EN: She sighed with her hands on her hips.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sighed with her hands on her hips.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いいけど」
鈴@「続きやるから返せ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Give it back so I can keep going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Give it back so I can keep going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃー！
鈴@「あ、こら、逃げるな馬鹿っ」
り出した猫は昼寝していた群れに突っ込む。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat, in the effort to get away from her, ran into a crowd of sleeping cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat, in the effort to get away from her, ran into a crowd of sleeping cats.

MESSAGE.JP: ぎゃ！　にゃー！
きなり中庭はうるさくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly the courtyard filled with noise.
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly the courtyard filled with noise.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「お、尻尾」
は紙切れを猫の尻尾から引き抜き、中を開く。
MESSAGE.EN: She removed a scrap of paper from the cat's tail and unfolded it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She removed a scrap of paper from the cat's tail and unfolded it.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「お、尻尾」
は紙切れを猫の尻尾から引き抜き、中を開いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She removed a scrap of paper from the cat's tail and unfolded it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She removed a scrap of paper from the cat's tail and unfolded it.

MESSAGE.JP: は紙切れをじっと見つめる。
は隣まで近づいてしゃがみ込み、猫を触る。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked up to her and, squatting down, placed my hand on the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked up to her and, squatting down, placed my hand on the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さっきは頑張ったね」
理樹@「次の指令、きた？」
は考え込んでいるのか、聞こえていないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was so lost in her thoughts she didn't appear to have heard me at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was so lost in her thoughts she didn't appear to have heard me at all.

MESSAGE.JP: は鈴の髪の香りがわかるぐらいそばまで寄って、覗き見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I got so close that I could smell the fragrance of her hair, and took a peek at the scrap of paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got so close that I could smell the fragrance of her hair, and took a peek at the scrap of paper.

MESSAGE.JP: ２−Ａ１番の恋患いを癒せ』
理樹@「その紙を送りつけてくる主は、学校の関係者じゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoever sent this, aren't they from our school?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoever sent this, aren't they from our school?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手な憶測を口にする。
理樹@「すべて学校にまつわることだし、学校の問題だしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They've all been about the school, and concerning school-related matters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They've all been about the school, and concerning school-related matters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「自分の手が回らないから、鈴を使ってるんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The sender is probably using you, because he or she can't deal with these problems on their own.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The sender is probably using you, because he or she can't deal with these problems on their own.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ、それだけじゃ説明つかないこともあるけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, that still doesn't explain everything, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, that still doesn't explain everything, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんにしても、学校の問題を深刻に受け取ってる人だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anyway, I'm sure it's someone who's seriously concerned about the problems of the school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anyway, I'm sure it's someone who's seriously concerned about the problems of the school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「で、今度の指令は？」
鈴@「…見ろ」
切れを渡される。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed me the scrap of paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed me the scrap of paper.

MESSAGE.JP: ２−Ａ１番の恋患いを癒せ』
いっきり下世話な指令になっていた！
は鈴を見る。その無垢で幼い顔を。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at Rin; at her innocent, childish face.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at Rin; at her innocent, childish face.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴…恋患いってわかる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin... Do you know what lovesickness is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin... Do you know what lovesickness is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「馬鹿にした口調だな、それぐらいわかるぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm not an idiot. Of course I do!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm not an idiot. Of course I do!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ならいいけど…」
あ、漫画かドラマぐらいで知識ぐらいはあるのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, maybe she picked it up from manga or TV dramas.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, maybe she picked it up from manga or TV dramas.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「とりあえずは、この２−Ａ１番ってのが誰なのかが最初の問題だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Problem number one is finding out who this ❛2-A1❜ is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Problem number one is finding out who this ❛2-A1❜ is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ふん…」
鈴@「まあ、２−Ａってのはクラスだろうな」
理樹@「お、今日の鈴は頼もしいね」
理樹@「じゃ、１番ってのは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So what about the number one after it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So what about the number one after it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ふん…」
鈴@「出席番号１番のやつだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The first one on teacher's attendance list.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The first one on teacher's attendance list.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おーっ、今日は冴えてるね」
鈴@「いつも冴えてないみたいに言うなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't say it like I'm usually not!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't say it like I'm usually not!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ、ごめんっ」
鈴@「よし、２−Ａに移動だ」
理樹@「時間もないし急ごう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're running out of time, let's hurry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're running out of time, let's hurry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「でも…」
が足を唐突に止めるので、僕はその体にぶつかってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: She stopped suddenly, and I bumped into her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stopped suddenly, and I bumped into her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、なに」
鈴@「１番ってことは男子だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Wouldn't the first one on the attendance list be a boy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wouldn't the first one on the attendance list be a boy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だね」
鈴@「知らない男子を今から訪ねるのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝To call out some guy I don't know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝To call out some guy I don't know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「嫌？」
鈴@「嫌じゃないが、ちょっと心の準備が必要だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's not that, I just need to prepare myself mentally...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's not that, I just need to prepare myself mentally...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なら、時間もないし…えーと放課後は練習だから、夜にしようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We don't have much time either, so... um... we've got practice after school, so how about this evening?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We don't have much time either, so... um... we've got practice after school, so how about this evening?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん…」
重な面持ちで頷いた。
鈴@「２−Ａ１…つまり、$K1エーイチ$K0という奴だ」
理樹@「ありゃ…さっきまで頼もしいと思ってたけど、いきなり不安になってきたぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh man... I just thought you were sounding reliable, but I'm a bit worried now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh man... I just thought you were sounding reliable, but I'm a bit worried now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんだ、この推理に問題があるのか？」
鈴@「あるいは具合でも悪いのか？」
理樹@「もちろん前者だけどさ…」
鈴@「問題があるのか？」
理樹@「いや、その推理だと２−が浮くじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, if we followed your reasoning, we'd be overlooking the ❛2❜ altogether.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, if we followed your reasoning, we'd be overlooking the ❛2❜ altogether.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃ、２年のエーイチくんだ」
鈴@「あたしはエーイチくんを探しだす」
理樹@「えー、２年のクラス全部回って、エーイチって子探すの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, you're going to search all the second year classes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, you're going to search all the second year classes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: りん、と鈴をひとつ鳴らした後、駆け出した。
MESSAGE.EN: The bell in her hair chimed once, and she dashed off.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bell in her hair chimed once, and she dashed off.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「大丈夫かなあ…」
もすぐその後を追う。
MESSAGE.EN: I waited a little and followed after her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I waited a little and followed after her.

MESSAGE.JP: は職員室の前で立ちつくしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I found Rin standing in front of the faculty office.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found Rin standing in front of the faculty office.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹、困った」
理樹@「どうしたの」
鈴@「先生に出席簿を借りて、エーイチくんを探してみたんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I borrowed a teacher's attendance list, looking for Eiichi-kun, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I borrowed a teacher's attendance list, looking for Eiichi-kun, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「２年にはいなかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝There isn't one in the second year.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝There isn't one in the second year.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「３年にはいたんだ」
鈴@「そのエーイチくんだろうか」
理樹@「いや、違うんじゃないかなあ」
理樹@「ねぇ、鈴。僕の推理を言おうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Say, Rin. Why don't you listen to my theory?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Say, Rin. Why don't you listen to my theory?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん？　なんだ、正解がわかってるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Huh? What, have you figured it out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Huh? What, have you figured it out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「多分ね」
理樹@「２−Ａというクラスは間違いないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝2-A is the class number, that much is pretty clear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝2-A is the class number, that much is pretty clear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「で、問題は１番という数字だけど、これは出席番号だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝As for the problem of the number ❛1,❜ I think it's got to be the number on the class attendance list.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝As for the problem of the number ❛1,❜ I think it's got to be the number on the class attendance list.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なあぁぁああぁぁーーっ!!」
のすごいショックを受けているようだ…。
鈴@「うーむ…その発想はなかったな」
鈴@「でも正しいと思う」
理樹@「でしょ」
鈴@「よし、２−Ａに移動だ」
理樹@「残念ながら、時間切れだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, but we haven't got time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, but we haven't got time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は携帯を開いて、時間を見せた。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened my cellphone and checked the clock.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my cellphone and checked the clock.

MESSAGE.JP: ぼ同時にチャイムが鳴った。
MESSAGE.EN: Right as I did, the bell rang.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right as I did, the bell rang.

MESSAGE.JP: う大丈夫だろう。放っておこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: She's okay now, I guess. I can leave her alone...
MESSAGE.Translation: She's okay now, I guess. I can leave her alone...

MESSAGE.JP: すらおう…。それが僕の生きる道だから…。
MESSAGE.EN: Wandering... That's my way of life...
MESSAGE.Translation: Wandering... That's my way of life...

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと、そんな期待が持てる休み時間だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Break time, which I'd been waiting for, was finally here.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Break time, which I'd been waiting for, was finally here.

MESSAGE.JP: 帯がポケットの中で震えて、僕を揺り起こす。
MESSAGE.EN: The cellphone in my pocket vibrated and shook me awake.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cellphone in my pocket vibrated and shook me awake.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…ん？　メールか）
業中だけど、差出人不明なので見ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I was in class, but the sender was listed as unknown so I decided to look.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was in class, but the sender was listed as unknown so I decided to look.

MESSAGE.JP: あなたに監視が付いている。普段通りにしていて　Ｔ』
鷺戸さんから、いきなりすぎる内容だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a sudden message from Tokido-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a sudden message from Tokido-san.

MESSAGE.JP: に監視がついている…？
囲を見渡してみるが、ただの授業中だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked around, but everything appeared normal.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked around, but everything appeared normal.

MESSAGE.JP: 、もう一通メールがきた。
今はおとなしく寝てて。あたしは隠れる　Ｔ』
れるの!?
気が全部吹き飛んでしまい、気が気じゃなくなってしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: My exhaustion evaporated and was replaced by worry.
MESSAGE.Translation: My exhaustion evaporated and was replaced by worry.

MESSAGE.JP: 憩時間になって、早速朱鷺戸さんにメールしてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: At break time, I quickly sent her a text.
MESSAGE.Translation: At break time, I quickly sent her a text.

MESSAGE.JP: そっちはどう？』
返事がない。
いしれぬ不安が忍び寄ってくる…
MESSAGE.EN: An indescribable sense of unease crept into my mind...
MESSAGE.Translation: An indescribable sense of unease crept into my mind...

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「ウコンでも飲めよっ!!」
イミングよく肩を捕まれ僕は飛び上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: With perfect timing, my shoulder was grabbed and I jumped.
MESSAGE.Translation: With perfect timing, my shoulder was grabbed and I jumped.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おおっ、飛び上がるほど励みになったか」
理樹@「超びびりましたから…あと肝臓の具合は至っていいですから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was just really surprised... and my liver is just fine, so no thank you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was just really surprised... and my liver is just fine, so no thank you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んな拷問を受けた後だから、滅入ってるのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I was probably feeling down because of the torture I'd gone through.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was probably feeling down because of the torture I'd gone through.

MESSAGE.JP: 静になるために顔でも洗ってこようか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I'll go wash my face to calm down...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I'll go wash my face to calm down...

MESSAGE.JP: 室移動があるためか、廊下には人が多くいた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was time to change classrooms, so the hall was full of people.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was time to change classrooms, so the hall was full of people.

MESSAGE.JP: う誰も彼もが怪しく思えてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I was suspicious of everyone now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was suspicious of everyone now.

MESSAGE.JP: 静になろうと努力しながら、歩きなれたはずの廊下を進んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked down the hall like so many times before as I tried to calm my nerves.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked down the hall like so many times before as I tried to calm my nerves.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふう…」
たい水で顔を引き締めたら、いくらかはマシになった気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: As my face tightened up from the cold water, I felt a little better.
MESSAGE.Translation: As my face tightened up from the cold water, I felt a little better.

MESSAGE.JP: ンカチを出して…と。
MESSAGE.EN: I took out my handkerchief and...
MESSAGE.Translation: I took out my handkerchief and...

MESSAGE.JP: れ？
んなハンカチって持ってたっけ…？
MESSAGE.EN: Do I have this kind of handkerchief?
MESSAGE.Translation: Do I have this kind of handkerchief?

MESSAGE.JP: るりと、透明な膜で包まれた銀白粉が流し台に落ちていった。
MESSAGE.EN: A silvery white powder wrapped in a clear film fell into the sink.
MESSAGE.Translation: A silvery white powder wrapped in a clear film fell into the sink.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだ？　この臭いは。
ンカチからはかすかにガソリンスタンドのような…
MESSAGE.EN: The handkerchief smelled vaguely like gasoline...
MESSAGE.Translation: The handkerchief smelled vaguely like gasoline...

MESSAGE.JP: んっ！
い粉が流し台で火を噴いた！
MESSAGE.EN: The white powder in the sink went up in flames!
MESSAGE.Translation: The white powder in the sink went up in flames!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわっ」
手な炎を上げながら、反応していく！
MESSAGE.EN: The chemical ignited and produced a bright flame.
MESSAGE.Translation: The chemical ignited and produced a bright flame.

MESSAGE.JP: かの薬品だ、これは…。
MESSAGE.EN: What kind of chemical is that...
MESSAGE.Translation: What kind of chemical is that...

MESSAGE.JP: は慌ててその場から逃げだした…。
MESSAGE.EN: I panicked and fled the scene...
MESSAGE.Translation: I panicked and fled the scene...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はぁ…はぁ…」
っくに授業は始まっていたが、教室に戻る気にはなれなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Class had started a while ago, but I didn't feel like going back to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Class had started a while ago, but I didn't feel like going back to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: ったい誰が何のためにやったんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Who the heck did that and why...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Who the heck did that and why...?

MESSAGE.JP: れは警告なんだろうか。
れとも…。
朱鷺戸@「理樹くん、おつかれ」
理樹@「うわぁっ」
朱鷺戸@「なによ、そんなに驚かなくてもいいじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝What? There's no need to be so surprised.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝What? There's no need to be so surprised.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「驚くよ…怖かったんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was surprised... because I was scared.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was surprised... because I was scared.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「もう大丈夫よ」
朱鷺戸@「相手が判明して、一人捕まえたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I identified and caught one of our enemies.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I identified and caught one of our enemies.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　そうなの？」
朱鷺戸@「ええ。あなたのおかげで」
とすると。
理樹@「さっき、僕がどんな目に遭ったか知ってる？」
朱鷺戸@「燃えてたわね。危ないわよ、薬品で遊ぶのは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝That was a nice fire. It's dangerous to play with chemicals.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝That was a nice fire. It's dangerous to play with chemicals.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり…。
理樹@「仕組んだの、朱鷺戸さんでしょ…」
朱鷺戸@「理樹くんの派手な立ち回りのおかげで、監視についていた三人が炙り出せたわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Thanks to your exaggerated reaction, I flushed out three of the people watching you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Thanks to your exaggerated reaction, I flushed out three of the people watching you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「思いがけない状況で素人ならすぐ現場に目を向けるけど、その三人は周囲と理樹くんを同時に確認してた。そりゃもろ場数を踏んだ奴の反応」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝In a situation like that, a normal person would turn to look, but those three kept an eye on you and their surroundings. That's how a seasoned veteran would react.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝In a situation like that, a normal person would turn to look, but those three kept an eye on you and their surroundings. That's how a seasoned veteran would react.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 然気付かなかった…。
朱鷺戸@「おそらく攻撃があったと勘違いしたと思うの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝They probably mistook it for an attack.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝They probably mistook it for an attack.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あの場面なら慌てた振りをしなきゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝It would be necessary to act confused in the situation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝It would be necessary to act confused in the situation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「理樹くんに顔を向けずに、なおかつ見続けたままでね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝But also still keep watching you without turning toward you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝But also still keep watching you without turning toward you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなことできるの…？」
朱鷺戸@「できるわよ？　訓練次第で真横の新聞ですら顔を向けずに読めるようになるんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Of course. With training, you can read a newspaper out of the corner of your eye without turning your head.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Of course. With training, you can read a newspaper out of the corner of your eye without turning your head.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んどん人間離れしていくような気が…。
MESSAGE.EN: My feeling that she's a superhuman just keeps growing...
MESSAGE.Translation: My feeling that she's a superhuman just keeps growing...

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「怪我もなかったし、万事問題なしということで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Since you're not hurt, everything is A-OK.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Since you're not hurt, everything is A-OK.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいや、問題あるから」
朱鷺戸@「怪我しても軽い火傷くらいよ。発火する前に取りに来る予定だったし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You wouldn❜t have gotten anything worse than light burns, anyway. Also, I planned on coming to get the compound before it started to burn.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You wouldn❜t have gotten anything worse than light burns, anyway. Also, I planned on coming to get the compound before it started to burn.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「発火？」
朱鷺戸@「ええ、ナトリウムって空気中でも酸化して燃え出すわ。化学で習わなかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Yeah, sodium also oxidizes and burns when exposed to air. Didn't you learn that in chemistry?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Yeah, sodium also oxidizes and burns when exposed to air. Didn't you learn that in chemistry?❞

MESSAGE.JP: かに覚えがある。ナトリウムは水と反応して、水素と水酸化ナトリウムに…。
MESSAGE.EN: I do remember that. Sodium reacts to moisture and becomes hydrogen and sodium hydroxide...
MESSAGE.Translation: I do remember that. Sodium reacts to moisture and becomes hydrogen and sodium hydroxide...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どっちも危ないよね!?」
朱鷺戸@「だから、その前に助けてあげようとは思ってたわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Like I said, I was going to come to help you before that happened.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Like I said, I was going to come to help you before that happened.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「もう寝てていいわよ。今は誰も監視してないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You can sleep now. No one's watching you at the moment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You can sleep now. No one's watching you at the moment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んというか…久々にプロのお手並みを拝見した気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow I felt like I was seeing a pro in action for the first time in a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow I felt like I was seeing a pro in action for the first time in a while.

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり朱鷺戸さんは本物のスパイなんだな、と再認識させられた。
MESSAGE.EN: This reconfirms that Tokido-san really is a genuine spy.
MESSAGE.Translation: This reconfirms that Tokido-san really is a genuine spy.

MESSAGE.JP: 休み。
買ワゴンは今日も沢山の生徒が群がっている。
MESSAGE.EN: The shopping wagon was busy again today.
MESSAGE.Translation: The shopping wagon was busy again today.

MESSAGE.JP: もずいぶん殺伐としてるなあ。
奪戦の怒号からは、新製品だとかそんな単語が聞こえてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Amidst the roars of battle, I could hear something about new merchandise.
MESSAGE.Translation: Amidst the roars of battle, I could hear something about new merchandise.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「新しいパンが入ったのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is there some new kind of bread...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is there some new kind of bread...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: しいものは誰だって食べてみたくなる。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyone would want to try a new item.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyone would want to try a new item.

MESSAGE.JP: 然的に競争率はあがる。
MESSAGE.EN: Inevitably, the competition was fiercer than usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: Inevitably, the competition was fiercer than usual.

MESSAGE.JP: も、あの人波にもまれるのは嫌だなあ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't want to go through that crowd...
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't want to go through that crowd...

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「怖じ気づいたの？」
理樹@「え？　うわぁっ」
ぐ隣に朱鷺戸さんが立っていて、驚く。
MESSAGE.EN: Much to my surprise, Tokido-san was standing right next to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Much to my surprise, Tokido-san was standing right next to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あのね、そういう反応はやめてくれないかしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Hey, could you stop reacting like that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Hey, could you stop reacting like that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なら、急に現れないでよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝As soon as you stop appearing out of nowhere...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝As soon as you stop appearing out of nowhere...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あなたが気づかなかっただけで、ずっとここに居たわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I've been here the whole time. You just didn't notice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I've been here the whole time. You just didn't notice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、それは気づかずにごめん…で、何してるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, sorry for not noticing... so what's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, sorry for not noticing... so what's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そりゃあパンを買いに来たのよ」
理樹@「ああ、朱鷺戸さんも新しいパン、買いにきたんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, you came for the new bread too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, you came for the new bread too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「…そういうこと。楽しみだわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝...That's right. I've been looking forward to it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝...That's right. I've been looking forward to it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉に何か親しみを感じた。彼女はいつでも戦いのことばかり考えていたから。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt a bit of intimacy in those words. Because she usually only thought about fighting.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt a bit of intimacy in those words. Because she usually only thought about fighting.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そして、訓練でもあるわ」
言撤回。
朱鷺戸@「なによ、その冷めた目つきは…」
理樹@「いや、気にしないで」
朱鷺戸@「ちょうどいいわ。勝負しましょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝This is perfect. Let's make it a competition.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝This is perfect. Let's make it a competition.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「しない」
朱鷺戸@「ルールは簡単よ」
朱鷺戸@「え、しないの!?」
理樹@「反応おそっ」
朱鷺戸@「あなた、あたしのパートナーなんでしょ？　なのに、勝負しないの？　訓練なのよ？　なぜ？　ホワーイ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You're my partner, aren't you? And yet you won't compete? This is training. So why? WHY!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You're my partner, aren't you? And yet you won't compete? This is training. So why? WHY!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやだって、昼休みだし…昼ぐらい落ち着いて食べたいし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because it's lunch break... I want to relax and eat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because it's lunch break... I want to relax and eat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あっ、そ！」
いと横を向いてしまう。気分を損ねさせてしまったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She suddenly turned away. Guess I accidentally ruined the mood.
MESSAGE.Translation: She suddenly turned away. Guess I accidentally ruined the mood.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「だったら、食べなさいよ。ひとりきりで食べちゃいなさいよ、そりゃ、もう、もぐもぐ食べたらいいじゃないっ、ひとりでもぐもぐしちゃいなさいよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝In that case, eat. Go ahead and eat by yourself. Come on, why don't you munch down? Go ahead and munch down by yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝In that case, eat. Go ahead and eat by yourself. Come on, why don't you munch down? Go ahead and munch down by yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: のすごい勢いで捲し立てられる。
MESSAGE.EN: She rambled on at an intimidating pace.
MESSAGE.Translation: She rambled on at an intimidating pace.

MESSAGE.JP: も昼休みまで訓練につきあってたら、体が持たない。
MESSAGE.EN: But my body can't handle doing training even during lunch.
MESSAGE.Translation: But my body can't handle doing training even during lunch.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめんね」
言謝って、パンを買いに、人混みの中に割って入っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: With a word of apology, I went through the crowd of people to buy my bread.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a word of apology, I went through the crowd of people to buy my bread.

MESSAGE.JP: したくない。
う面と向かって言えず…曖昧に頷いてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at her and vaguely nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at her and vaguely nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「どちらが当たりのパンを買えるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝We'll see who can buy certain items.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝We'll see who can buy certain items.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「もちろん、一番高得点なのは新しいパン」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Of course, the new one is worth the most points.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Of course, the new one is worth the most points.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「ついで、惣菜パンなんかがポイント高いわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Also, savory breads and sandwiches are worth a lot of points.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Also, savory breads and sandwiches are worth a lot of points.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にカツサンドは人気が高い。
MESSAGE.EN: The cutlet sandwich was especially popular and worth a lot.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cutlet sandwich was especially popular and worth a lot.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そして、ハズレは売れ残る菓子パンね。あんパンなんて最低の１点」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝And Finally, there are the sweet rolls that nobody wants. Stuff like anpan is worth only one point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝And Finally, there are the sweet rolls that nobody wants. Stuff like anpan is worth only one point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「いい？」
理樹@「それぐらいならいいけど…」
朱鷺戸@「負けたほうは、罰ゲームね」
理樹@「えっ」
朱鷺戸@「じゃ、ゲームスタートっ」
ゲームなんて聞いてないっ、ていうか、有無を言わせず勝手に勝負を始められたっ！
MESSAGE.EN: She started the game before I had time to complain about the punishment part!
MESSAGE.Translation: She started the game before I had time to complain about the punishment part!

MESSAGE.JP: なれば、やるしかないっ…急ごう！
MESSAGE.EN: Guess I've got no choice... better hurry!
MESSAGE.Translation: Guess I've got no choice... better hurry!

MESSAGE.JP: 女の姿はもうない。
るで一瞬でかき消えたようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She'd disappeared completely in an instant.
MESSAGE.Translation: She'd disappeared completely in an instant.

MESSAGE.JP: も遅れまいと、人波に割ってはいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Not wanting to fall behind, I dove into the crowd.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not wanting to fall behind, I dove into the crowd.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「遅かったわね」
でに彼女はテーブルについて、目の前にパンを並べていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She already had a bunch of bread laid out on the table in front of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She already had a bunch of bread laid out on the table in front of me.

MESSAGE.JP: は汗までかいてるというのに、なんて涼しげな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was sweating, but she was totally fine...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was sweating, but she was totally fine...

MESSAGE.JP: 手が悪すぎる…。
朱鷺戸@「理樹くんも、並べなさいよ」
理樹@「うん…」
面の席に座り、パンを並べる。
MESSAGE.EN: I sat down and laid out my bread.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sat down and laid out my bread.

MESSAGE.JP: ーカーでもしている気分だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like we were playing poker.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like we were playing poker.

MESSAGE.JP: の手に新しいパンはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't manage to get my hands on the new bread.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't manage to get my hands on the new bread.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「焼きそばパンに、フランクロール、クロワッサン」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Yakisoba bread, hot dog roll, and croissant.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Yakisoba bread, hot dog roll, and croissant.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「計１２点」
訳はさっぱりわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea where she got that number.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea where she got that number.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「で、こちらは新商品のパンに、サンドイッチ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝On my side, I have the new bread and a sandwich.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝On my side, I have the new bread and a sandwich.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「このふたつで１５点。勝ちよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝These two are worth fifteen points. I win.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝These two are worth fifteen points. I win.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれ？　ちょっと待ってよ」
はその新商品とやらの銘柄を確かめる。
MESSAGE.EN: I checked the description of the new bread item.
MESSAGE.Translation: I checked the description of the new bread item.

MESSAGE.JP: には『ニュー・$K3あんぱん$K0』と書いてあった。
MESSAGE.EN: The description on the bag read ❛New $K3Anpan$K0.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: The description on the bag read ❛New $K3Anpan$K0.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これ、あんパン…だよね？」
朱鷺戸@「どこがよ」
理樹@「いや、商品名からして…」
朱鷺戸@「中身が違うわよ」
理樹@「ええと…こしあんと粒あんをきっちり交互に敷き詰め焼き上げたパンです…って書いてあるんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Umm... it says ❛a bread made by kneading together strained bean paste and sweet bean jam in turn, then baking.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Umm... it says ❛a bread made by kneading together strained bean paste and sweet bean jam in turn, then baking.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「っ…」
朱鷺戸@$S020「あーそうよっ、買うまで気づかなかったのよ！　これはあんパンで最低の１点よ、サンドイッチが５点だから計６点！　ダブルスコアの大敗よ、惨めでしょ、哀れでしょ、ほら笑えばいいじゃないっ、あーはっはっはっは！って、笑いなさいよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@$S020 ❝That's right! I didn't notice! It's the dreaded 1-pointer, which totals 6 points when added to my 5-point sandwich! I got half your score! I'm wretched! Pitiful, right?! Just go ahead and laugh! Give me your best ❛Ahahaha!❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@$S020 ❝That's right! I didn't notice! It's the dreaded 1-pointer, which totals 6 points when added to my 5-point sandwich! I got half your score! I'm wretched! Pitiful, right?! Just go ahead and laugh! Give me your best ❛Ahahaha!❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あーっはっはっはっ！」
た出た！　謎の自虐パフォーマンス。
MESSAGE.EN: There it was again! Her mysterious self-deprecating performance.
MESSAGE.Translation: There it was again! Her mysterious self-deprecating performance.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「くそぅ…黙ってたら気づかないと思ったのよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Damn... I thought you wouldn't notice if I kept my mouth shut...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Damn... I thought you wouldn't notice if I kept my mouth shut...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも新商品には変わらないんだから、高得点つけてもいいんじゃないかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But it is still the new bread, so it might be okay to give you more points...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But it is still the new bread, so it might be okay to give you more points...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あんパンは１点なのよっ」
理樹@「あ、そ…なんかこだわりがあるんだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah... guess you're pretty obstinate about that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah... guess you're pretty obstinate about that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の人、完璧そうで、律儀にすべての落とし穴にことごとく足を突っ込んで歩いていく不運を背負ったような人みたいだなあ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She's the kind of person who seems perfect but has bad enough luck to fall into every pitfall imaginable...
MESSAGE.Translation: She's the kind of person who seems perfect but has bad enough luck to fall into every pitfall imaginable...

MESSAGE.JP: る意味可哀想だ…。
朱鷺戸@「なによ、ニューあんぱんって、わけがわからないわっ、食う気失せたわっ、周りのパンだけ食べて餡だけにしてやろうかしらっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝What the hell's with that ❛New Anpan❜? It doesn't make any sense! I don't feel like eating it! I'll eat the rest of the bread and just leave the bean paste!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝What the hell's with that ❛New Anpan❜? It doesn't make any sense! I don't feel like eating it! I'll eat the rest of the bread and just leave the bean paste!❞

MESSAGE.JP: つぶつ恨み言のようなことを言っている…。
MESSAGE.EN: She was lost in her own little world...
MESSAGE.Translation: She was lost in her own little world...

MESSAGE.JP: ういう姿にもだんだん慣れてきた気がするのは、いいことなのか、悪いことなのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm not sure if it's a good thing or not that I'm getting used to seeing her like this...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm not sure if it's a good thing or not that I'm getting used to seeing her like this...

MESSAGE.JP: だ、楽しい人だなあ、と思えるのはいいことのひとつだと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: But at very the least, it's a good thing that I think she's a fun person.
MESSAGE.Translation: But at very the least, it's a good thing that I think she's a fun person.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「さあ、罰ゲーム、言いなさいよ」
理樹@「いや、いいって。厳密にきみが負けたわけじゃないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's fine. You didn't exactly lose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's fine. You didn't exactly lose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あなたの中で曖昧であっても構わないわ。あたしの中では厳密に負けたのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I don't care if the result is ambiguous to you. In my eyes, I clearly lost.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I don't care if the result is ambiguous to you. In my eyes, I clearly lost.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、罰ゲームも曖昧にしておくよ。だったら問題ないわけでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, how about I make the punishment ambiguous. That's fair, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, how about I make the punishment ambiguous. That's fair, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そりゃ、あなたの勝手だものね。そこまで口出しはできないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝That's up to you. That's out of my hands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝That's up to you. That's out of my hands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んな罰ゲームをしてもらおう…。
MESSAGE.EN: What kind of punishment should it be...
MESSAGE.Translation: What kind of punishment should it be...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、午後からの授業、先生の出す問題、全部に挙手して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, during afternoon classes, you have to raise your hand every time the teacher asks a question.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, during afternoon classes, you have to raise your hand every time the teacher asks a question.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あなた、確かめられないじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You have no way knowing if I follow through.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You have no way knowing if I follow through.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから曖昧な罰ゲームなんだよ。別にすべてに答える必要もないし、挙手さえしてもらえれば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why it's ambiguous. You don't need to answer every question, just raise your hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why it's ambiguous. You don't need to answer every question, just raise your hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「すごく優等生っぽくて、朱鷺戸さん、きっと格好いいと思うな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think you acting like a perfect honor student would be really cool.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think you acting like a perfect honor student would be really cool.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「見れないのが残念だけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's a shame I can't see it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's a shame I can't see it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「カメラで証拠でも用意しましょうか」
理樹@「いいってばっ、曖昧なまんまで」
朱鷺戸@「なんかすっきりしないわね…こんなのでいいのかしら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝This is so unclear... is it really okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝This is so unclear... is it really okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふあああ…」
近の練習で疲れも溜まっているのか、授業中はかなり眠くなる。
MESSAGE.EN: Thanks to all the practices we'd had recently, I was constantly worn out and felt very tired during class.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thanks to all the practices we'd had recently, I was constantly worn out and felt very tired during class.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ん」
帯のバイブに気付く。メールの着信だ。
MESSAGE.EN: My cellphone was vibrating. A text message.
MESSAGE.Translation: My cellphone was vibrating. A text message.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…授業中に誰からだろう）
にはなるけど、見つかったら怒られそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was curious, but I'd get in trouble if I was caught.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was curious, but I'd get in trouble if I was caught.

MESSAGE.JP: や、授業終わってからにしよう。
とまず、板書の写しに戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: I resumed taking notes from the blackboard, for now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I resumed taking notes from the blackboard, for now.

MESSAGE.JP: 教師@「じゃ、早いが今日はこれまで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝Okay, we're going to wrap it up early today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝Okay, we're going to wrap it up early today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しく、チャイムの前に終わった。
MESSAGE.EN: Unusual though it may be, class was over before the bell rang.
MESSAGE.Translation: Unusual though it may be, class was over before the bell rang.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「終わった…」
びをしながら、さっきのメールを思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I stretched, and remembered the text message from earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stretched, and remembered the text message from earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず、見てみよう…。
出人：来ヶ谷　唯湖$dタイトル：『無題』
文：『暇だから何か面白いことをしろ』
MESSAGE.EN: Message: [I'm free now, so let's do something fun.]
MESSAGE.Translation: Message: [I'm free now, so let's do something fun.]

MESSAGE.JP: っぽど暇だったんだろうなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed awfully free all right.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed awfully free all right.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…なんだ、せっかく構って欲しかったのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...What's with you, when I wanted to have some fun together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...What's with you, when I wanted to have some fun together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、授業中はさすがにまずいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it's not something you should do during class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it's not something you should do during class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「まあ、仕方あるまい」
小毬@「ゆ、ゆいちゃんなにあれーっ!?」
来ヶ谷@「いや、ゆいちゃんと呼ぶのは止めてくれ…」
理樹@「え、どうしたの？」
小毬@「さ、さっきメールで…」
よくわからないが、僕がメールに反応しなかったせいで、小毬さんに被害が及んだらしい…。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know what it was about, but looks like because I had ignored the text message, Komari-san took some flak...
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know what it was about, but looks like because I had ignored the text message, Komari-san took some flak...

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「はっはっは」
小毬@「ふええっ、い、いつの間に撮ったのあんなのーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fuee, when did you take that picture～!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fuee, when did you take that picture～!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何を送ったのさ…」
の事については二人ともノーコメントだった。
の席を見る。もうその姿はなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked to Rin's seat, but she wasn't there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked to Rin's seat, but she wasn't there.

MESSAGE.JP: でに課題の達成に向かっているのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She must've already left to complete the task.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must've already left to complete the task.

MESSAGE.JP: 下に出ると、すぐ懸命に走るその背中に追いついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I dashed out into the corridor to catch up with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I dashed out into the corridor to catch up with her.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんだ、もうこないのかと思った」
理樹@「いや、いくよ、鈴ひとりじゃ大変でしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It could become problematic if you went by yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It could become problematic if you went by yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: てせっかくの休み時間だ。どうしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Break time at last. What should I do?
MESSAGE.Translation: Break time at last. What should I do?

MESSAGE.JP: んだろう…。
出人：来ヶ谷　唯湖$dタイトル：『無題』
文：『暇だから何か面白いことをしろ』
MESSAGE.EN: Message: [I'm free now, so let's have some fun.]
MESSAGE.Translation: Message: [I'm free now, so let's have some fun.]

MESSAGE.JP: だからって言われてもなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She's free she says, so what about it...
MESSAGE.Translation: She's free she says, so what about it...

MESSAGE.JP: れば、来ヶ谷さんは頬杖をついた体勢で、右手だけ机の陰に隠して携帯を操作しているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at her, she was leaning on her chin with only her right hand working the cellphone under the desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at her, she was leaning on her chin with only her right hand working the cellphone under the desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 壇からはとても携帯をいじってるようには見えないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess it would be impossible to see what she was doing from where the teacher was standing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess it would be impossible to see what she was doing from where the teacher was standing.

MESSAGE.JP: とまず、そのメールに『何をすればいいのさ』と返す。
MESSAGE.EN: To begin with, I replied with [Like what?].
MESSAGE.Translation: To begin with, I replied with [Like what?].

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんはちらり、と机の影の携帯に目をやり、またそのままの体勢で返信をしてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san glanced down below the desk without changing her posture, and typed a reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san glanced down below the desk without changing her posture, and typed a reply.

MESSAGE.JP: 出人：来ヶ谷　唯湖$dタイトル：『無題』
文：『とりあえずスキップしながら「アッヒョー」と叫んで真人少年に$K33ペガサス百烈拳$K0をお見舞いしろ』
MESSAGE.EN: Message: [Just skip to the part where you run over to young man Masato, yelling ❛ahhyo-❜ and execute the $K33Hundred Pegasus Strike$K0 on him.]
MESSAGE.Translation: Message: [Just skip to the part where you run over to young man Masato, yelling ❛ahhyo-❜ and execute the $K33Hundred Pegasus Strike$K0 on him.]

MESSAGE.JP: むちゃくちゃだこれ…。
いうか、よっぽど暇なんだなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Or rather, she must be really bored...
MESSAGE.Translation: Or rather, she must be really bored...

MESSAGE.JP: ったことをそのまま返信。
MESSAGE.EN: I sent a reply with my thoughts.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sent a reply with my thoughts.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐに返事がきた。
じゃあキミにステキな画像を送る』
MESSAGE.EN: [All right, I'll send you a wonderful picture then.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [All right, I'll send you a wonderful picture then.]

MESSAGE.JP: られてきた添付画像を開く。
んか、緑と白のしましまのアップが。
MESSAGE.EN: It was something with green and white stripes.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was something with green and white stripes.

MESSAGE.JP: 像サイズが小さくて、なんだかはよくわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: The image was small; I couldn't make out what it was supposed to be.
MESSAGE.Translation: The image was small; I couldn't make out what it was supposed to be.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだこれ。
小毬君のしましまぱんつ』
理樹@「ぶッ!?」
先生@「どうした、直枝」
理樹@「い、いえ…むせただけです」
んてもん送りつけて来るんだあの人はっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: What the hell did she send me!!
MESSAGE.Translation: What the hell did she send me!!

MESSAGE.JP: 冗談だ』
談ですまないよこれ、と返信。
MESSAGE.EN: [That was too much for a joke.] I texted her back.
MESSAGE.Translation: [That was too much for a joke.] I texted her back.

MESSAGE.JP: まあ私のぱんつだから気にするな』
MESSAGE.EN: [They're my panties, so don't worry about it.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [They're my panties, so don't worry about it.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ぶぶッ!!」
先生@「なんだ直枝、風邪でも引いたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝What's wrong, Naoe, have you caught a cold?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝What's wrong, Naoe, have you caught a cold?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「い、いえ…」
まあ真実は無地のノートに折り目つけてチェックペン引いただけだ』
MESSAGE.EN: [To tell the truth, I just used some paper and a marker.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [To tell the truth, I just used some paper and a marker.]

MESSAGE.JP: タチの悪いいたずらするよなぁ、この人も…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...What a sorry excuse for a prank she came up with this time...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What a sorry excuse for a prank she came up with this time...

MESSAGE.JP: らに画像つきメールが着信。
おしり』
れは肘のアップだってのはすぐにわかった。
こうするとエロい』
さっきの肘画像にチェックペンを引いたノートの切れ端を載せた画像。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The picture showed a few lines drawn on a scrap of notebook paper attached to her elbow.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The picture showed a few lines drawn on a scrap of notebook paper attached to her elbow.

MESSAGE.JP: タニマが少し見えてるのがポイントだ』
MESSAGE.EN: [The point is to show a little valley like this.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [The point is to show a little valley like this.]

MESSAGE.JP: 当に、よっぽど暇なんだなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She's really got too much free time...
MESSAGE.Translation: She's really got too much free time...

MESSAGE.JP: 局、授業が終わるまでの３０分間、来ヶ谷さんからのわけのわからないメールは止まる事がなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't stop texting me until the end of class (30 minutes later).
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't stop texting me until the end of class (30 minutes later).

MESSAGE.JP: うやく休み時間になる。
が僕のほうを向くと、頷き、立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin looked my way, gave me a nod and stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin looked my way, gave me a nod and stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: 題の続きだ。
に続いて僕も教室を後にする。
MESSAGE.EN: Leaving the classroom, I followed after her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Leaving the classroom, I followed after her.

MESSAGE.JP: み時間になった。
が僕のほうを向くと、頷き、立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin looked my way, gave me a nod and stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin looked my way, gave me a nod and stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: 題の続きだ。
に続いて僕も教室を後にする。
MESSAGE.EN: Leaving the classroom, I followed after her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Leaving the classroom, I followed after her.

MESSAGE.JP: とふたり、目的の教室に向かう途中。
MESSAGE.EN: We were working our way toward the designated classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were working our way toward the designated classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「はぁ、はぁ…」
下で見知った姿が視界に入った。
MESSAGE.EN: We met someone we knew at the foot of the stairs.
MESSAGE.Translation: We met someone we knew at the foot of the stairs.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ふーっ」
の上にちょこんと座っている三枝さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Saigusa-san, sitting on a desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Saigusa-san, sitting on a desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「三枝さん」
三枝@「あ、理樹くん。やはー」
枝さんは僕の顔を見ると、いつもの笑顔で応えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She faced us with her usual smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She faced us with her usual smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「鈴ちゃんもやはー」
鈴@「や…やはー」
張って挨拶を返していた。
MESSAGE.EN: She did her best to greet her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She did her best to greet her.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の後ろに隠れてしまう。
三枝@「相変らず恥ずかしがりっ子だねぇ」
理樹@「あー、うん…」
理樹@「その机とか、何してるの？」
三枝@「机と椅子がぐらぐらするのがあってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝There was this chair and desk which are a bit wobbly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝There was this chair and desk which are a bit wobbly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「それを空き教室のと替えようかと思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I was thinking about replacing them with ones from an empty classroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I was thinking about replacing them with ones from an empty classroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「三枝さんのクラスの？」
三枝@「うん。先生に聞いたら替えていいって言うからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Yep. A teacher told me it would be good idea to exchange them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Yep. A teacher told me it would be good idea to exchange them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が僕の服の袖をくいくいと引っ張った。
さっさと行こう、という合図だろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She was trying to signal that we should get going already.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She was trying to signal that we should get going already.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「さーって、じゃあもうひとがんばりするかナ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Now then, I've got to push on a little further.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Now then, I've got to push on a little further.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは机から下りると、再び机を抱えようとした。
MESSAGE.EN: She hopped down from the desk and heaved it up in her arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hopped down from the desk and heaved it up in her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「手伝おうか？」
三枝@「うん？　いいよ。大丈夫」
三枝@「それに鈴ちゃんとどっか行くんじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝And weren't you going somewhere with Rin-chan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝And weren't you going somewhere with Rin-chan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん、それはそうだけど」
鈴@「いや、手伝う」
は自分から進んで三枝さんの机に歩み寄った。
MESSAGE.EN: She volunteered and walked up to the desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: She volunteered and walked up to the desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ありゃ、いいよいいよ、大丈夫だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Oh, it's okay, I'm telling you it's really okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Oh, it's okay, I'm telling you it's really okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「困ってる人は助けないといけない」
っちをみる。
鈴@「用事は後回しだ」
理樹@「うん、僕もそれでいいと思うよ。こっちの用は夜でもいいわけだからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, I agree. The other task can wait until tonight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, I agree. The other task can wait until tonight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういうわけだから、僕らも手伝うよ」
三枝@「え、ほんと？」
鈴@「…ちょっと待て」
三枝@「はい？　私？」
鈴は三枝さんにそう言うと、僕の袖を引っ張る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Rin tugged on my sleeve after saying that to Saigusa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Rin tugged on my sleeve after saying that to Saigusa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どうすればいい」
理樹@「どうすればって…」
鈴@「机、なんか重そうだ…」
鈴@「…でも、課題もあるしな…」
鈴@「どうしよう…」
理樹@「うーん」
要するに、手伝うかどうかで悩んでるんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Basically, she was wondering whether we should help her out or not.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Basically, she was wondering whether we should help her out or not.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「課題は今度でも出来るけど、三枝さんを手伝うのは多分今しか出来ないと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think we can still finish the task later, but if we're going to help Saigusa-san, now's our only chance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think we can still finish the task later, but if we're going to help Saigusa-san, now's our only chance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「課題の方はいつでも僕が手伝うからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll help you with the task anytime later on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll help you with the task anytime later on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: りん、と頷いた。
三枝@「なんかの相談？」
理樹@「あー、うん」
鈴@「…手伝う」
三枝@「え、ほんと？」
理樹@「お安いご用だよ」
は椅子を持った。
理樹@「机のほうがよくない？」
三枝@「大丈夫、大丈夫」
鈴@「こっち持つ」
三枝@「あー、サンクス鈴ちゃん！」
真正面に向き合うのは照れくさいようだけど、持ったまま逃げるわけにも行かないので、微妙な表情のまま顔をうつむかせていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was obviously embarrassed standing face to face with Saigusa-san, but couldn't run away holding the desk, so she just cast her eyes down making a complex expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was obviously embarrassed standing face to face with Saigusa-san, but couldn't run away holding the desk, so she just cast her eyes down making a complex expression.

MESSAGE.JP: るっ。
鈴@「前みえんだろーーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I can't see in front of me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I can't see in front of me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: あ、台無しに…。
段を下りて、下の空き教室へ。
MESSAGE.EN: We went down the stairs, heading off to the empty classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: We went down the stairs, heading off to the empty classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 階の突き当たりは不要になった椅子や机が積み重なっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Located at the very end of the first floor corridor, it contained piles of unused desks and chairs.
MESSAGE.Translation: Located at the very end of the first floor corridor, it contained piles of unused desks and chairs.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「よいしょっ。ありがと、ふたりとも」
三枝@「ふーっ」
理樹@「机の脚がおかしいの？」
三枝@「ちょっとぐらぐらするんだよね」
かに机の脚の付け根にあるボルトがゆるんでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Indeed, the bolt intended to fasten the leg to the chair was pretty loose.
MESSAGE.Translation: Indeed, the bolt intended to fasten the leg to the chair was pretty loose.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「どれがいいかな」
み重なった机や椅子は降ろすのも、ひと苦労そうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like it would be tough bringing down a desk or chair from that pile.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like it would be tough bringing down a desk or chair from that pile.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「うーん。なんかどれも壊れてるっぽい…」
