MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Hm... Somehow, all of them look broken...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Hm... Somehow, all of them look broken...❞

MESSAGE.JP: れていたものを置く場所なのだから当然だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Obviously, it was used for storing broken stuff to begin with.
MESSAGE.Translation: Obviously, it was used for storing broken stuff to begin with.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「綺麗なの、ありそう？」
があたりの机をぎしぎしと動かしていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin tried moving a nearby desk and it made a creaking sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin tried moving a nearby desk and it made a creaking sound.

MESSAGE.JP: どれもどこかしら傷んでるようだった。
理樹@「全滅っぽいねぇ…」
三枝@「せっかく持ってきたのに。骨折り損だったかな～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝And we even brought it all this way, what a waste of effort～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝And we even brought it all this way, what a waste of effort～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「別の空き教室から持ってきたらどうかな」
三枝@「あ、そっか。理樹くんの教室の近く、空き教室だったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah, that's right. There's an unused classroom near yours too, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah, that's right. There's an unused classroom near yours too, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「そうしよう、そうしよう」
三枝@「どれにしようかな～」
理樹@「どれでも一緒だよ」
はまたひとりで使えそうな机を探し始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin continued looking for a usable desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin continued looking for a usable desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「でもまたぐらぐらしたら使うひとが嫌でしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝But the person it's for wouldn't be happy with another unstable one, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝But the person it's for wouldn't be happy with another unstable one, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それはまあ、そうかもだけど…」
理樹@（あれ？）
は小さな疑問を覚えた。
三枝@「んー。これにしようかな」
理樹@「ねぇ三枝さん」
三枝@「うん？　なぁに、理樹くん」
理樹@「その壊れた机って、三枝さんのじゃないの？」
三枝@「違うよ。クラスのひとの」
理樹@「…頼まれたの？」
三枝@「うん？　あぁ」
の不思議そうにしている顔を見て、言いたいことがわかったのか三枝さんは頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She first looked at me with a puzzled expression, but then as though finally understanding what I meant, nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She first looked at me with a puzzled expression, but then as though finally understanding what I meant, nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「その子忙しい子だからさ。代わりにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝That girl's busy, so I'm doing it for her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝That girl's busy, so I'm doing it for her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「整備委員だし、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I'm a maintenance committee member after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I'm a maintenance committee member after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あー、そういえば前、確かにそんな会話があったような…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, right, you did mention something like that before...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, right, you did mention something like that before...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「なぁーにー。その『意外だなぁ』って口調は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝What's with that ❛how unexpected❜ tone of voice?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝What's with that ❛how unexpected❜ tone of voice?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、そういうわけじゃないよ、でも」
三枝@「でも、なに？」
理樹@「いや、その」
三枝@「んー？」
理樹@「…でもやっぱり意外だよね」
かもどうやら真面目にやっているっぽい…。
MESSAGE.EN: Not only that, she seemed serious about it too...
MESSAGE.Translation: Not only that, she seemed serious about it too...

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「うわ、酷いなぁ、理樹くん。私はマメに仕事してるだけなのになぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Whoa, you're awful, Riki-kun. And I'm being so serious about my work, here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Whoa, you're awful, Riki-kun. And I'm being so serious about my work, here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん、ごめん三枝さん」
三枝@「いいけどねー。ふーんだ」
ょっと機嫌を損ねてしまったようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like I made her a little angry.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like I made her a little angry.

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは腕組みをして、ぷい、と長い方の髪の毛尻尾を揺らしてそっぽを向いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She crossed her arms, and turned her back to me, toying with the longer of her pigtails.
MESSAGE.Translation: She crossed her arms, and turned her back to me, toying with the longer of her pigtails.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん…」
三枝@「ん」
を下げてからちらり、と三枝さんを伺う。
MESSAGE.EN: I bowed in apology and peeked up to see her reaction.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bowed in apology and peeked up to see her reaction.

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは頬を小さく膨らませている。
MESSAGE.EN: She puffed her cheeks a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: She puffed her cheeks a little.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「…んー。まぁ、いいや。理樹くんにはいつもお世話になってるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...*Sigh*, all right. You always help me out after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...*Sigh*, all right. You always help me out after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「少々のことは許しましょう。えへん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I can overlook the small stuff. Ehe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I can overlook the small stuff. Ehe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは腕組みを解いて腰に手を当てると、ちょこん、と胸を反らした。
MESSAGE.EN: She uncrossed her arms, placing one behind her, and leaned back slightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She uncrossed her arms, placing one behind her, and leaned back slightly.

MESSAGE.JP: ラスティックの髪留めとお下げがふらふら揺れている。
理樹@「そ、そうしてくれると助かるよ…」
三枝@「本気で怒ったわけじゃないから安心してね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Don't worry, I wasn't really that angry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Don't worry, I wasn't really that angry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだか、三枝さんは思ったよりもマメなひとみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san is more hard-working than I thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san is more hard-working than I thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「これでいいのか？」
三枝@「ん、ちょうど良さそうだね」
が引っ張り出してきた机を品定めする。
MESSAGE.EN: She assessed the desk Rin had dragged along.
MESSAGE.Translation: She assessed the desk Rin had dragged along.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「よいしょっと」
枝さんは椅子を机の上に置いてから両手で持ち上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She set a chair on top of the desk and lifted them both in her arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: She set a chair on top of the desk and lifted them both in her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ニンゲンには意外性が必要でしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It's important for humans to have an element of surprise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It's important for humans to have an element of surprise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: してにこっと笑う。
理樹@「う、うん」
三枝@「脈絡は必要ないけどね」
理樹@（それは必要だと思うよ…）
は心の中で思ったけれど、また機嫌を損ねてはなんなので黙っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Afraid she'd get mad again, I kept the thought to myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Afraid she'd get mad again, I kept the thought to myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「わ、もうこんな時間。授業始まっちゃう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Oh, this late already? Class is about to start.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Oh, this late already? Class is about to start.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「またね、理樹くん、鈴ちゃん」
理樹@「あ、本当だ。僕らも戻らないと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, that's right. We should get back too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, that's right. We should get back too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はちりん、とだけ頷く。本当に無口だなあ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin only nodded once. She really wasn't very talkative...
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin only nodded once. She really wasn't very talkative...

MESSAGE.JP: たちは空き教室を出た。
三枝@「間に合うかなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I wonder if I'll make it in time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I wonder if I'll make it in time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「手伝ったほうがいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wouldn't it be better if I helped you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wouldn't it be better if I helped you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「手伝ったらみんな遅刻しちゃうからいいよ～。んじゃね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝If you did, we'd all be late, so it's fine～. See ya.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝If you did, we'd all be late, so it's fine～. See ya.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うん。気をつけて…」
らは三枝さんを見送った。
―少し間抜けだったかな、気をつけて、なんて。
MESSAGE.EN: ――I wonder if ❛Be careful❜ was a stupid thing to say in that situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――I wonder if ❛Be careful❜ was a stupid thing to say in that situation.

MESSAGE.JP: り言を呟く僕を鈴が不思議そうな目で見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was looking at me uncertainly while I murmured to myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was looking at me uncertainly while I murmured to myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「はぁ、はぁ…」
段の踊り場で見知った姿が視界に入った。
MESSAGE.EN: I met someone I knew at the foot of the stairs.
MESSAGE.Translation: I met someone I knew at the foot of the stairs.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ふーっ」
の上にちょこんと座っている三枝さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Saigusa-san, sitting on a desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Saigusa-san, sitting on a desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「三枝さん、何してるの？」
三枝@「あ、理樹くん。やはー」
枝さんは僕の顔を見ると、いつもの笑顔で答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She faced me with her usual smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She faced me with her usual smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「机と椅子がぐらぐらするのがあってね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝There was this chair and desk which are a bit wobbly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝There was this chair and desk which are a bit wobbly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「それを空き教室のと替えようかと思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I was thinking about replacing them with ones from an empty classroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I was thinking about replacing them with ones from an empty classroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「三枝さんのクラスの？」
三枝@「うん。先生に聞いたら替えていいって言うからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Yep. A teacher told me it would be a good idea to exchange them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Yep. A teacher told me it would be a good idea to exchange them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは机から下りると、再び机を抱えようとした。
MESSAGE.EN: She hopped down from the desk and heaved it up in her arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hopped down from the desk and heaved it up in her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「手伝おうか？」
三枝@「うん？　いいよ。大丈夫」
い、と机を持ち上げて、三枝さんの視線は床に置かれたままの椅子に落ちた。
MESSAGE.EN: She lifted the desk, and then glanced at the chair, still lying on the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: She lifted the desk, and then glanced at the chair, still lying on the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ごめん、理樹くん。やっぱり手伝って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I'm sorry, Riki-kun, maybe I could use your help after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I'm sorry, Riki-kun, maybe I could use your help after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それぐらいお安いご用だよ」
は椅子を持った。
理樹@「机のほうがよくない？」
三枝@「大丈夫、大丈夫」
段を下りて、下の空き教室へ。
MESSAGE.EN: We went down the stairs, heading off to the empty classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: We went down the stairs, heading off to the empty classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 階の突き当たりは不要になった椅子や机が積み重なっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Located at the very end of the first floor corridor, it contained piles of unused desks and chairs.
MESSAGE.Translation: Located at the very end of the first floor corridor, it contained piles of unused desks and chairs.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「よいしょっ。ありがと、理樹くん」
三枝@「ふーっ」
理樹@「机の脚がおかしいの？」
三枝@「ちょっとぐらぐらするんだよね」
かに机の脚の付け根にあるボルトがゆるんでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Indeed, the bolt intended to fasten the leg to the chair was pretty loose.
MESSAGE.Translation: Indeed, the bolt intended to fasten the leg to the chair was pretty loose.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「どれがいいかな」
み重なった机や椅子は降ろすのも、ひと苦労そうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like it would be tough bringing down a desk or chair from that pile.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like it would be tough bringing down a desk or chair from that pile.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「うーん。なんかどれも壊れてるっぽい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Hm... Somehow, all of them look broken...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Hm... Somehow, all of them look broken...❞

MESSAGE.JP: れていたものを置く場所なのだから当然だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Obviously, it was used for storing broken stuff to begin with.
MESSAGE.Translation: Obviously, it was used for storing broken stuff to begin with.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「綺麗なの、ありそう？」
理樹@「ぱっと見た限りはないなぁ」
三枝@「せっかく持ってきたのに。骨折り損だったかな～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝And we even brought it all this way, what a waste of effort～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝And we even brought it all this way, what a waste of effort～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「別の空き教室から持ってきたらどうかな」
三枝@「あ、そっか。理樹くんの教室の近く、空き教室だったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah, that's right. There's an unused classroom near yours too, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah, that's right. There's an unused classroom near yours too, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「そうしよう、そうしよう」
三枝@「どれにしようかな～」
理樹@「どれでも一緒だよ」
三枝@「でもまたぐらぐらしたら使うひとが嫌でしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝But the person it's for wouldn't be happy with another unstable one, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝But the person it's for wouldn't be happy with another unstable one, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それはまあ、そうかもだけど…」
理樹@（あれ？）
は小さな疑問を覚えた。
三枝@「んー。これにしようかな」
理樹@「ねぇ三枝さん」
三枝@「うん？　なぁに、理樹くん」
理樹@「その壊れた机って、三枝さんのじゃないの？」
三枝@「違うよ。クラスのひとの」
理樹@「…頼まれたの？」
三枝@「うん？　あぁ」
の不思議そうにしている顔を見て、言いたいことがわかったのか三枝さんは頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She first looked at me with a puzzled expression, but then as though finally understanding what I meant, nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She first looked at me with a puzzled expression, but then as though finally understanding what I meant, nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「その子忙しい子だからさ。代わりにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝That girl's busy, so I'm doing it for her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝That girl's busy, so I'm doing it for her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「整備委員だし、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I'm a maintenance committee member after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I'm a maintenance committee member after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あー、そういえば前、確かにそんな会話があったような…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, right, you did mention something like that before...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, right, you did mention something like that before...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「なぁーにー。その『意外だなぁ』って口調は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝What's with that ❛how unexpected❜ tone of voice?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝What's with that ❛how unexpected❜ tone of voice?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、そういうわけじゃないよ、でも」
三枝@「でも、なに？」
理樹@「いや、その」
三枝@「んー？」
理樹@「…でもやっぱり意外だよね」
かもどうやら真面目にやっているっぽい…。
MESSAGE.EN: Not only that, she seemed serious about it too...
MESSAGE.Translation: Not only that, she seemed serious about it too...

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「うわ、酷いなぁ、理樹くん。私はマメに仕事してるだけなのになぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Whoa, you're awful, Riki-kun. And I'm being so serious about my work, here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Whoa, you're awful, Riki-kun. And I'm being so serious about my work, here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん、ごめん三枝さん」
三枝@「いいけどねー。ふーんだ」
ょっと機嫌を損ねてしまったようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like I made her a little angry.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like I made her a little angry.

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは腕組みをして、ぷい、と長い方の髪の毛尻尾を揺らしてそっぽを向いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She folded her arms, and turned her back to me, toying with the longer of her pigtails.
MESSAGE.Translation: She folded her arms, and turned her back to me, toying with the longer of her pigtails.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん…」
三枝@「ん」
を下げてからちらり、と三枝さんを伺う。
MESSAGE.EN: I bowed in apology and peeked up to see her reaction.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bowed in apology and peeked up to see her reaction.

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは頬を小さく膨らませている。
MESSAGE.EN: She puffed her cheeks a little.
MESSAGE.Translation: She puffed her cheeks a little.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「…んー。まぁ、いいや。理樹くんにはいつもお世話になってるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...*Sigh*, all right. You always help me out after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...*Sigh*, all right. You always help me out after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「少々のことは許しましょう。えへん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I can overlook the small stuff. Ehe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I can overlook the small stuff. Ehe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは腕組みを解いて腰に手を当てると、ちょこん、と胸を反らした。
MESSAGE.EN: She uncrossed her arms, placing one behind her, and leaned back slightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She uncrossed her arms, placing one behind her, and leaned back slightly.

MESSAGE.JP: ラスティックの髪留めとお下げがふらふら揺れている。
理樹@「そ、そうしてくれると助かるよ…」
三枝@「本気で怒ったわけじゃないから安心してね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Don't worry, I wasn't really that angry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Don't worry, I wasn't really that angry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだか、三枝さんは思ったよりもマメなひとみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san is more hard-working than I thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san is more hard-working than I thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「よいしょっと」
枝さんは椅子を机の上に置いてから両手で持ち上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She set a chair on top of the desk and lifted them both in her arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: She set a chair on top of the desk and lifted them both in her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ニンゲンには意外性が必要でしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It's important for humans to have an element of surprise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It's important for humans to have an element of surprise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: してにこっと笑う。
理樹@「う、うん」
三枝@「脈絡は必要ないけどね」
理樹@（それは必要だと思うよ…）
は心の中で思ったけれど、また機嫌を損ねてはなんなので黙っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Afraid she'd get mad again, I kept the thought to myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Afraid she'd get mad again, I kept the thought to myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「わ、もうこんな時間。授業始まっちゃう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Oh, this late already? Class is about to start.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Oh, this late already? Class is about to start.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「またね、理樹くん」
理樹@「あ、本当だ。僕も戻らないと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, that's right. I have to get back too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, that's right. I have to get back too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たちは空き教室を出た。
三枝@「間に合うかなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I wonder if I'll make it in time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I wonder if I'll make it in time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「手伝ったほうがいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wouldn't it be better if I helped you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wouldn't it be better if I helped you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「手伝ったら理樹くんが遅刻しちゃうからいいよ～。んじゃね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝If you did, you'd be late yourself, so it's fine～. See ya.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝If you did, you'd be late yourself, so it's fine～. See ya.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うん。気をつけて…」
は三枝さんを見送った。
―少し間抜けだったかな、気をつけて、なんて。
MESSAGE.EN: ――I wonder if ❛Be careful❜ was a stupid thing to say in that situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――I wonder if ❛Be careful❜ was a stupid thing to say in that situation.

MESSAGE.JP: は独り言を呟きながら、自分の教室に戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: Murmuring to myself, I went back to my classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Murmuring to myself, I went back to my classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、頑張ってね」
三枝@「あはは、ありがとっ」
三枝@「よいっしょっと」
枝さんは廊下を歩いていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She started walking down the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started walking down the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「手伝いってあげたいところなんだけど、これからさすらいたくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'd like to help you, but I was going to wander...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'd like to help you, but I was going to wander...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「さすらいは大事ですヨ。頑張ってさすらってくださいませませ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Wandering is important. Please do your best wandering.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Wandering is important. Please do your best wandering.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめんね」
うだ、さすらおう…。
食の後。
三枝@「新聞紙ぶれぇえーどっ!!」
三枝さんが教室に入ってくるなり、新聞紙を棒状に丸めたものを振りかざしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Saigusa-san dashed in, wielding a newspaper rolled up into a tube.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Saigusa-san dashed in, wielding a newspaper rolled up into a tube.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「なんですかそれはっ。とってもカッコいいのですっ!!」
三枝@「あはは～、そうでしょ？　でしょ？」
クドのセンスもよくわからない。
理樹@「突然また、何を始めたのさ…」
三枝@「いやー、例によって廃品回収などをしていたのですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Well, you know how we're always collecting scrap paper.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Well, you know how we're always collecting scrap paper.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「そしたら新聞紙がたっくさんあったからさ。リサイクルリサイクル～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It so happened there were a lot of newspapers. Recycle, recycle～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It so happened there were a lot of newspapers. Recycle, recycle～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「リサイクルはいいことだと思いますっ」
理樹@「それはいいけど、何するのさそれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's fine, but what's up with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's fine, but what's up with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「それはですネ…」
三枝@「小毬ちゃん小毬ちゃん」
小毬@「ふえ？　なに？」
三枝@「うちとったりーっ!!」
ぁんっ。
小毬@「あ、あううーっ!?」
三枝@「こうして遊ぶのですヨっ」
小毬@「ふええ…」
小毬@「…でもあんまり痛くないー」
三枝@「というわけでこれでチャンバラやるよ～」
クド@「はいっ、とっても楽しそうですっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay, it looks like a lot of fun!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay, it looks like a lot of fun!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ルールは斬るときに『かたじけのうござるっ!!』、斬られたら『無念なりー!!』って言いながら倒れること！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝The rule is, when you attack you say ❛I'm grateful to thee!❜, when you're cut you say ❛Such a sorrow!❜ and fall down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝The rule is, when you attack you say ❛I'm grateful to thee!❜, when you're cut you say ❛Such a sorrow!❜ and fall down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いか…。
が毎晩やってることを教えたら、みんな驚くだろうな。
MESSAGE.EN: If I showed all of them what I do every night, they'd be surprised.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I showed all of them what I do every night, they'd be surprised.

MESSAGE.JP: は毎晩戦ってるんだよ。
当に生き死にを賭けた戦いなんだよ。
三枝@「みんなの分も作ってきたから、レッツラファイト～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I made one for everyone, so let's fight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I made one for everyone, so let's fight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「はい、みおちんも参加参加ー」
は、なんてのんきな。
はその中に入っていく気がまったくしない。
MESSAGE.EN: I really didn't feel like joining in.
MESSAGE.Translation: I really didn't feel like joining in.

MESSAGE.JP: れぐらい皮肉すぎる光景だった。
理樹@「いや意味わかんないんだけど…」
三枝@「はい小毬ちゃんかたじけのうござるっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝All right, Komari-chan, I'm grateful to thee!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝All right, Komari-chan, I'm grateful to thee!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「む、無念なりー!!」
三枝@「クド公かたじけのうござるっ!!」
クド@「無念なりーですっ!!」
直訳すると『ありがとうございます』『残念です』だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A direct translation would be ❝Thank you❞ and ❝That's regrettable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A direct translation would be ❝Thank you❞ and ❝That's regrettable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「みんなの分も作ってきたから、レッツラファイト～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I made one for everyone, so let's fight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I made one for everyone, so let's fight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「はい、みおちんも参加参加ー」
いながら、傍観していた西園さんの手に新聞紙を握らせる。
MESSAGE.EN: She said, placing a newspaper in Nishizono-san's hand, who'd up till now been merely watching.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said, placing a newspaper in Nishizono-san's hand, who'd up till now been merely watching.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「またですか？　こういうのはあまり興味がないのですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝What now? I'm not really interested in this kind of thing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝What now? I'm not really interested in this kind of thing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「まーまー、やってみたら楽しいよ、きっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝There there, just give it a try and you're sure to enjoy it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝There there, just give it a try and you're sure to enjoy it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんも三枝さんに巻き込まれる常連のようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san was habitually dragging Nishizono-san in as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san was habitually dragging Nishizono-san in as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「思わず$K31ハラキリ$K0したくなっちゃうねっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝You might end up wanting to commit $K31harakiri$K0!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝You might end up wanting to commit $K31harakiri$K0!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやそれはやばいから…」
三枝@「あれ～唯ねえと鈴ちゃんはいないんだ、残念」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Huh, Rin-chan and Yui-nee aren't here? Too bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Huh, Rin-chan and Yui-nee aren't here? Too bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「姉御に一度刃向かってみたかったのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I wanted to try facing off against Anego for once.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I wanted to try facing off against Anego for once.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんはさらっととんでもないことを言ってるような気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had a feeling she'd just casually stated something unbelievable.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had a feeling she'd just casually stated something unbelievable.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「いや、つまりブレードだけにハムカウ、なんちてー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝So, basically all you have to do is use it like a sword.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝So, basically all you have to do is use it like a sword.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「えいえいっ」
ドに斬りかかられている西園さんが、微妙な表情を浮かべていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san wore a complex expression on her face while Kud was stabbing her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san wore a complex expression on her face while Kud was stabbing her.

MESSAGE.JP: 応に困っているらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She clearly wasn't sure how to react.
MESSAGE.Translation: She clearly wasn't sure how to react.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「えいえいえいっ」
西園@「…痛いですよ？」
一生懸命答えたみたいだけど、ぐだぐだだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Seemed like she was trying her hardest to give a proper response, but she still sounded spiritless.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Seemed like she was trying her hardest to give a proper response, but she still sounded spiritless.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「って、誰も私の話聞いてないよ!?」
三枝@「まぁ、いいや…はじめよっか、こまりん」
小毬@「おっけーですよ～」
三枝@「あ、狙うのは頭だけで、一番斬られた回数が多い人が片付けですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah, you can only aim at the head, and the one who gets slashed the most has to take out the papers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah, you can only aim at the head, and the one who gets slashed the most has to take out the papers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 局目的はそこなんじゃないだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: That must have been her goal all along...

の四方からの乱れ斬り!!

の掛け声で、猫たちが一斉に来ヶ谷さんにまとわりつきにかかる。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It's done! A totally cool, ❛Mai Newspaper Blade❜!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Rin-kun and Onee-san, zero times. We're tied for first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少し満足げだった。
三枝@「んで小毬ちゃんは？」
斬られ過ぎ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She had really got slashed too much.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She had really got slashed too much.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「おねーさんが０回で１位か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Zero times here, meaning first place is mine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Zero times here, meaning first place is mine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「何とも張り合いのないことだな」
三枝@「んで小毬ちゃんは？」
斬られ過ぎ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She had really got slashed too much.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She had really got slashed too much.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「というわけで、ダントツで小毬ちゃんになったわけなのですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝So, that makes Komari-chan the last place...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝So, that makes Komari-chan the last place...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「カワイソーだからやっぱりみんなで手伝ってあげまショウ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Poor soul, everyone let's help her out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Poor soul, everyone let's help her out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うえーん、はるちゃんありがとう～」
来ヶ谷@「まあ、そもそもその辺りは葉留佳君の仕事だったはずだがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it was Haruka-kun's duty to begin with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it was Haruka-kun's duty to begin with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「え？　いやー、あ、あははは姉御細かいことは言いっこナシっすヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Eh? Ahahaha, don't sweat the small stuff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Eh? Ahahaha, don't sweat the small stuff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いうわけで、そのあとはみんなで廃品置き場に新聞紙の束を持っていき、チャンバラごっこは終了となった。
MESSAGE.EN: Thus, after rounding up the game we brought the load of newspapers to the recycle area.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thus, after rounding up the game we brought the load of newspapers to the recycle area.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…真人と謙吾がいたら、もっとすごいことになってたんだろうなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...If Masato and Kengo were here, it would've turned into something even more amazing...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...If Masato and Kengo were here, it would've turned into something even more amazing...)

MESSAGE.JP: ょっとそう思う。
んだか騒がしいけど、放っておこう。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems very lively here, but I'd better leave them alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems very lively here, but I'd better leave them alone.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人、遊ぼうよっ」
真人@「おっと、オレの筋肉は今休憩中だぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, my muscles are resting now, you know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, my muscles are resting now, you know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっか、間が悪かったね。また遊んでね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really, too bad then. We'll have fun some other time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really, too bad then. We'll have fun some other time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オーケー、またのお越しをどうぞー、待ってるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay, drop by any time, I'll be waiting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay, drop by any time, I'll be waiting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うだ…。僕はこんなのんきな時間を過ごしてる場合じゃない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Right... It was no time to be fooling around...
MESSAGE.Translation: Right... It was no time to be fooling around...

MESSAGE.JP: あ、さすらおう…。
Ｒが終わり、放課後となる。
真人@「相変わらずてめぇは部活か？」
ち上がり背を向ける謙吾にそう真人は訊く。
MESSAGE.EN: He asked Kengo who stood up without even turning in his direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: He asked Kengo who stood up without even turning in his direction.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「当然だ」
真人@「ちっ…女の相手はする暇あんのに、オレたちの相手する暇はねぇってかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Tsk... You have time for some girl, but none for us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Tsk... You have time for some girl, but none for us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…なんのことだ」
真人@「学食の裏のベンチで並んでお茶してたじゃねぇかよ、女と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Weren't you drinking tea with some girl on a bench behind the school cafeteria?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Weren't you drinking tea with some girl on a bench behind the school cafeteria?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉に帰り支度を始めていたクラスメイトたちが一斉にざわめいた後、不自然に静まりかえる。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone in the classroom was busy getting ready to go home, but after Masato spoke, it suddenly became quiet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone in the classroom was busy getting ready to go home, but after Masato spoke, it suddenly became quiet.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「後ろからベンチごと抱えて、人力フリーフォールしてやろうとしたらさ、ふたりだったからできなかったじゃねぇか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I wanted to lift up the bench from behind and let you into freefall, but since there were two of you I couldn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I wanted to lift up the bench from behind and let you into freefall, but since there were two of you I couldn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ひとりでもするなよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Don't do that even when I'm alone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Don't do that even when I'm alone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえの、うわぁ、すごいや！って喜ぶ顔みたかったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I wanted to see your happy face go ❛Whoa, awesome!❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I wanted to see your happy face go ❛Whoa, awesome!❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「普通に危ないからな…」
人は鈍感なので気づいていないが、それはスクープだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato was dense so he didn't notice, but it'd become a real scoop already.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato was dense so he didn't notice, but it'd become a real scoop already.

MESSAGE.JP: 際、クラスの至るところでひそひそ話が交わされている。
MESSAGE.EN: The whole classroom was buzzing with whispers.
MESSAGE.Translation: The whole classroom was buzzing with whispers.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、その女性が一体誰なのか、という内容のものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: They were speculating who the girl might be.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were speculating who the girl might be.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は僕ら幼なじみの中では一番異性にもてた。
MESSAGE.EN: Of all of us, Kengo was the most popular with the opposite sex.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of all of us, Kengo was the most popular with the opposite sex.

MESSAGE.JP: ど、それを自覚してかしないでか、謙吾は女子を遠ざける傾向にあった。
MESSAGE.EN: But, perhaps being unaware of it himself, he tended to keep his distance from girls.
MESSAGE.Translation: But, perhaps being unaware of it himself, he tended to keep his distance from girls.

MESSAGE.JP: でさえ、謙吾が鈴以外の誰か特定の女の子とふたりきりでいたなんて話、今まで聞いたことがなかったほどだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd actually never heard about him being alone with any girl other than Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd actually never heard about him being alone with any girl other than Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 食裏といえば、一応屋外でも食べられるようにとベンチとテーブルは設置されていたが、雨ざらしで錆びつき、誰も好んで選ばない場所となっている。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a table and bench behind the school for those who wanted to eat outside, but it had rusted, so nobody took much interest in it.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a table and bench behind the school for those who wanted to eat outside, but it had rusted, so nobody took much interest in it.

MESSAGE.JP: んな場所で、女の子とふたりきり、それはつまり、たぶん…
MESSAGE.EN: To be alone with a girl in such a place...
MESSAGE.Translation: To be alone with a girl in such a place...

MESSAGE.JP: い引き、というやつだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It must have been a date.
MESSAGE.Translation: It must have been a date.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえだったら、屋上から落とすぐらいしても平気だろ？　自由落下する興奮を味わってくれよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wouldn't you be fine even falling from the rooftop? You should taste the thrill of freefall.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wouldn't you be fine even falling from the rooftop? You should taste the thrill of freefall.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「無茶を言うな…」
んながやきもきしているのがここまで伝わってくる。真人はどうして、その相手の女性のことについて訊かないのかと。
MESSAGE.EN: I could sense everyone's growing impatience in my skin. Why isn't Masato asking about the girl and who she was?
MESSAGE.Translation: I could sense everyone's growing impatience in my skin. Why isn't Masato asking about the girl and who she was?

MESSAGE.JP: 全に付き合ってるじゃん！とキレたような女子の声が僕らの耳まで届いた。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛They're totally going out!❜ we heard the girls grumble in vexation.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛They're totally going out!❜ we heard the girls grumble in vexation.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「えっ、彼女だったのか？」
謙吾@「違う…」
謙吾@「…おまえたちが期待しているようなものではない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...It's not what you guys seem to be thinking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...It's not what you guys seem to be thinking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「相手は…」
謙吾@「弓道部の古式だ」
の名を聞いた途端、みんな押し黙ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: The instant everyone heard the name, the classroom fell into silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: The instant everyone heard the name, the classroom fell into silence.

MESSAGE.JP: の名にみんな聞き覚えがあり、そして、彼女の身の上を知っていたから、それ以上は詮索できなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone knew the name, and furthermore, everyone was aware of her situation, so nobody attempted to pry further.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone knew the name, and furthermore, everyone was aware of her situation, so nobody attempted to pry further.

MESSAGE.JP: 吾もそれ以上何も言わなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Nor did Kengo say anything more.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nor did Kengo say anything more.

MESSAGE.JP: ったまま、鞄を持つと、教室を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: Without saying a word, he picked up his bag and left the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without saying a word, he picked up his bag and left the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: の後、たったったっと鈴が走ってきて、僕に訊いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Not long after that, Rin dashed over.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not long after that, Rin dashed over.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「彼女だったのか？」
理樹@「違うよ…」
れたようにそう答えてから、そして、鈴の交友関係の狭さを思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered in sheer amazement, but then I remembered how small her circle of friends was.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered in sheer amazement, but then I remembered how small her circle of friends was.

MESSAGE.JP: 道部の古式みゆきさん。
MESSAGE.EN: Miyuki Koshiki from the archery club.
MESSAGE.Translation: Miyuki Koshiki from the archery club.

MESSAGE.JP: 才美少女とよく形容されていた。
の脳裏には克明に描かれている。
MESSAGE.EN: The image of her was clearly etched into my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: The image of her was clearly etched into my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: しい顔立ち、その一部を覆う、悲劇の印が。
MESSAGE.EN: A beautiful face, and covering part of it, a symbol of tragedy.
MESSAGE.Translation: A beautiful face, and covering part of it, a symbol of tragedy.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…眼帯をずっとしてる子、見たことないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Have you seen a girl who always wears an eye-patch?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Have you seen a girl who always wears an eye-patch?❞

MESSAGE.JP: りんちりんと首を振る。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook her head and the bell in her hair chimed twice.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook her head and the bell in her hair chimed twice.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「その子、片目の視力を失ったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's lost vision in one of her eyes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's lost vision in one of her eyes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「怪我でもなかったんだけど、今でも眼帯を外さず、ずっとつけてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She wasn't injured or anything, but she doesn't remove it, even now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She wasn't injured or anything, but she doesn't remove it, even now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は黙って聞いている。
理樹@「弓道では有名な流派の家の子で、将来もすごく嘱望されてたんだけど、不幸なことに病気でね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's the daughter to a family well-known for its skill in archery, so there were high expectations for her, but tragically an unfortunate illness...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's the daughter to a family well-known for its skill in archery, so there were high expectations for her, but tragically an unfortunate illness...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「同じ武道だし、将来を期待されてるという意味では謙吾は一番近い存在だったんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝In a similar position related to martial arts and high expectations, Kengo is the closest to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝In a similar position related to martial arts and high expectations, Kengo is the closest to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから、いい話相手になってやってるんだと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why I think they've got a lot of things to talk about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why I think they've got a lot of things to talk about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はようやく納得顔になる。
鈴@「あいつは無愛想だが、いい奴だからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He's not very sociable, but he's a good person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He's not very sociable, but he's a good person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「その子も頼もしいだろーな」
理樹@「そうだね」
理樹@「でも、なんだか自分たちがやってることが恥ずかしくなってきたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, I'm starting to feel embarrassed about what we're up to now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, I'm starting to feel embarrassed about what we're up to now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん？」
理樹@「謙吾は、自分の道もしっかり歩んでるし、そんな子の力にもなってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kengo is walking his own path, becoming strong for a girl like her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kengo is walking his own path, becoming strong for a girl like her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今、僕らがやってることってさ…」
理樹@「なにかのためになってるのかな…」
鈴@「うーん…」
はひとしきり考えた後…
鈴@「とりあえず楽しいな」
う簡単に答えた。
は思わず笑ってしまう。確かに。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't help but smile. She's right about that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't help but smile. She's right about that.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「じゃあ、おまえもメンバー探し手伝えよ」
鈴@「ばいばい」
真人@「こらーっ！」
真人@「うわ、ほんとにいっちまいやがった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Whoa, she really ran away on us...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Whoa, she really ran away on us...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やっぱり僕らふたりしか残らなかったね。メンバー探し、どうする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝In the end, we're the only ones left. What're we going to do about the member search?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝In the end, we're the only ones left. What're we going to do about the member search?❞

MESSAGE.JP: Ｒが終わり、放課後となる。
真人@「相変わらずてめぇは部活か？」
ち上がり背を向ける謙吾にそう真人は訊く。
MESSAGE.EN: He asked Kengo who stood up without even turning in his direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: He asked Kengo who stood up without even turning in his direction.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「当然だ」
真人@「ちっ…剣道馬鹿だな」
謙吾@「望むところだ」
れだけ答えて、教室を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: He answered and left the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: He answered and left the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あんなやつ、こっちからいーっだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝A guy like you, we don't need anyway!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝A guy like you, we don't need anyway!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあまあ、そんなでかい体で、子供並みの捨て台詞やめようね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey Masato, you shouldn't be throwing such childish retorts with that huge body of yours.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey Masato, you shouldn't be throwing such childish retorts with that huge body of yours.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さて、メンバー探しだけど、どうする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, what'll we do about looking for members?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, what'll we do about looking for members?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そうだな…」
真人@「オレは、筋肉関係を当たってみる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'll go ask around the muscle clique.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'll go ask around the muscle clique.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、そうなんだ。（出た！　わけのわからない筋肉頼み！）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I see. (Here it comes! An incomprehensible muscle request!)❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I see. (Here it comes! An incomprehensible muscle request!)❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんか女ばっかで貧相なチームになり始めてるからな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Our team is becoming a feeble one with nothing but girls in it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Our team is becoming a feeble one with nothing but girls in it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえは何関係を当たる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What clique are you going to check?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What clique are you going to check?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、普通に知り合い関係だけど…」
人は一瞬不服そうな顔をするが、すぐ気を取り直す。
MESSAGE.EN: A shadow of dissatisfaction crossed his face, but cleared almost immediately.
MESSAGE.Translation: A shadow of dissatisfaction crossed his face, but cleared almost immediately.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まあ、いいや。ちっとは使えそうなの連れてこいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, fine. If you manage to find anyone even slightly promising, bring them along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, fine. If you manage to find anyone even slightly promising, bring them along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「努力はするけど…」
真人@「よし、じゃあ、解散だ。健闘を祈る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay, dismissed. Best of luck to you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay, dismissed. Best of luck to you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: るとなぜか真人は教室の後ろに空いたスペースに腹這いに寝転がる。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason he lay down in the empty space in the back of the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason he lay down in the empty space in the back of the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: して、廊下に向けてほふく前進を始めた…。
MESSAGE.EN: And after that, he started slowly crawling toward the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: And after that, he started slowly crawling toward the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: んなんだろう…筋肉関係を当たるには、目立ってはいけないのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: What's with that... muscle clique, anyway... I'm hoping he won't do something that'll make him stand out.
MESSAGE.Translation: What's with that... muscle clique, anyway... I'm hoping he won't do something that'll make him stand out.

MESSAGE.JP: しいことは聞きたくなかったので、何も突っ込まず追い抜いて（このへんは慣れだ）、僕は教室を後にする。
MESSAGE.EN: I really didn't want to know the details, so I just went on ahead of him and walked out of the classroom. (I was used to this by now, anyway.)
MESSAGE.Translation: I really didn't want to know the details, so I just went on ahead of him and walked out of the classroom. (I was used to this by now, anyway.)

MESSAGE.JP: て、どこを探すか…。
んまりのんびりしていると、ほふく前進の真人に追いつかれて絡まれるぞ…。
MESSAGE.EN: If I stay here for too long, the crawling Masato will catch up to me...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I stay here for too long, the crawling Masato will catch up to me...

MESSAGE.JP: ら、背後から、ふっ…ふっ…と荒い息づかいが忍び寄ってくる…。
MESSAGE.EN: There, I could already hear his strained breathing drawing closer to me...
MESSAGE.Translation: There, I could already hear his strained breathing drawing closer to me...

MESSAGE.JP: 庭に向かうことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I headed off to the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I headed off to the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（えーと…）
りを見回す。
ヤキの下に西園さんの姿が見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was Nishizono-san sitting under a zelkova tree.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was Nishizono-san sitting under a zelkova tree.

MESSAGE.JP: れまでは気にしたこともなかったけれど、きっと去年からずっと西園さんはあそこで昼を食べて、放課後は本を読んでいたのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It just occured to me, but she must have been coming here to eat her lunch and read her books under that tree since the beginning of the year.
MESSAGE.Translation: It just occured to me, but she must have been coming here to eat her lunch and read her books under that tree since the beginning of the year.

MESSAGE.JP: は西園さんが、その時間に教室にいないことにも気づかなければ、こうしていつもケヤキの下にいることも知らなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't even noticed that she wasn't in the classroom for all that time, so there's no way I could have figured out that she was always spending her time under the zelkova tree here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't even noticed that she wasn't in the classroom for all that time, so there's no way I could have figured out that she was always spending her time under the zelkova tree here.

MESSAGE.JP: は昨日と同じ過ちを繰り返さないように、そっと近づく。
MESSAGE.EN: In order not to repeat the mistake I made yesterday, I was stepping very softly.
MESSAGE.Translation: In order not to repeat the mistake I made yesterday, I was stepping very softly.

MESSAGE.JP: も、小さな鳥たちは僕の気配にとても敏感だった。
MESSAGE.EN: However, the small birds around still noticed me.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, the small birds around still noticed me.

MESSAGE.JP: の影が西園さんに届く前に、飛び立ってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: They flew off before my shadow even reached her.
MESSAGE.Translation: They flew off before my shadow even reached her.

MESSAGE.JP: ズメや鳩、見慣れた鳥たちが羽ばたくのを、西園さんは見送っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san was looking at the flock of sparrows, pigeons and other birds as they flapped their wings, soaring into the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san was looking at the flock of sparrows, pigeons and other birds as they flapped their wings, soaring into the sky.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry... I was trying not to make any noise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry... I was trying not to make any noise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っくりと、西園さんが振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: She slowly turned her face to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She slowly turned her face to me.

MESSAGE.JP: の手には、パンの耳が握られている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was holding a crust of bread in her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was holding a crust of bread in her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「仕方ありません。野生の鳥ですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝There was nothing you could have done. They're wild birds.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝There was nothing you could have done. They're wild birds.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「わたしも、地面にえさを投げているだけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I, too, was just throwing them food on the ground.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I, too, was just throwing them food on the ground.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうなんだ。てっきり手から食べるのかと思ったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see. I was sure you were feeding them by hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see. I was sure you were feeding them by hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「さすがに、それは無理です」
西園@「では、どうぞ」
されたビニール袋には、パンの耳が入っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed me a plastic bag with bread crusts inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed me a plastic bag with bread crusts inside.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もらって良いの？」
西園@「…そのつもりだったのではないのですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Wasn't that what you came here for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Wasn't that what you came here for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「昨日、ずいぶんおいしそうに食べていましたよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yesterday, you really seemed to enjoy them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yesterday, you really seemed to enjoy them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、ありがたくいただきます」
は黙々とパンの耳をかじった。
MESSAGE.EN: I began munching on them in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: I began munching on them in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: ん、あまい。
ぐもぐ。
ぐもぐもぐ。
西園@「…まるで、わたしが直枝さんに粗食を与えているみたいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It's like I always treat you, Naoe-san, to poor food.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It's like I always treat you, Naoe-san, to poor food.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「『恐怖の鬼嫁、現る現る』と歌にされてしまいそうです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's like in the song ❛A frightful demonic wife appears, appears.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's like in the song ❛A frightful demonic wife appears, appears.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ僕は西園さんの尻に敷かれる側なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, does that make me your subjugated husband?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, does that make me your subjugated husband?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…わたしは直枝さんの配偶者になった覚えはありません」
西園@「事実に反した発言をされては、困ります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's a problem if you go against facts like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's a problem if you go against facts like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっ、最初に言ったのは西園さんじゃあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, you're the one who said it first, Nishizono-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, you're the one who said it first, Nishizono-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「細かいことを気にしてはいけません」
理樹@「いや、ちょっとは気にしようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No I think the small stuff matters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No I think the small stuff matters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 度は去っていった鳥たちが、ふたたび周りをうろうろしている。
MESSAGE.EN: The birds that had flown away had started to come back.
MESSAGE.Translation: The birds that had flown away had started to come back.

MESSAGE.JP: はパンの耳をひとつ、そちらに投げた。
MESSAGE.EN: I threw a crust of bread to them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I threw a crust of bread to them.

MESSAGE.JP: 羽の鳩が首を傾げ、こちらを見た。
MESSAGE.EN: One of the pigeons tilted its head and looked in my direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: One of the pigeons tilted its head and looked in my direction.

MESSAGE.JP: らってもいいの？　そんな風に言っているみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: As if to ask if it was okay to take it.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if to ask if it was okay to take it.

MESSAGE.JP: ンの耳はおいしい。
も、喉が渇く。
理樹@「もむももまい？」
西園@「お行儀が悪いですよ。物を食べながらしゃべってはいけないとご両親から言われませんでしたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You have poor manners. You shouldn't talk with your mouth full... didn't your parents ever teach you that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You have poor manners. You shouldn't talk with your mouth full... didn't your parents ever teach you that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…どうぞ」
筒のお茶を注いで、僕に渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: She poured some tea from a bottle and handed it to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She poured some tea from a bottle and handed it to me.

MESSAGE.JP: くり、とパンの耳の固まりを飲み込んで、僕は答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I drank it to clear my throat and replied.
MESSAGE.Translation: I drank it to clear my throat and replied.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕、親いないけどね」
っ、と西園さんが申し訳なさそうな顔をする。
西園@「申し訳ありませんでした。知らないとは言え、失礼なことを…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Forgive me. Even though I didn't know, it was still rude of me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Forgive me. Even though I didn't know, it was still rude of me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、ごめん。僕の方こそ、そんなつもりじゃないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, sorry. I didn't mean it that way either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, sorry. I didn't mean it that way either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕にはリトルバスターズがいるからね」
西園@「りとるばすたーず…」
西園@「それはなんですか？」
理樹@「…えーと、悪を成敗する正義の味方、だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um... Allies of justice who punish evil.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um... Allies of justice who punish evil.❞

MESSAGE.JP: に出して言うのは、ちょっと恥ずかしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I became embarrassed once I said it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I became embarrassed once I said it.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、その言葉は、あのときの僕の心を、温かくさせた。
MESSAGE.EN: But at the same time, those words made me feel warm inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: But at the same time, those words made me feel warm inside.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「最近は野球ばっかりやってるけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Though lately we've only been playing baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Though lately we've only been playing baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すり、と西園さんが笑った。
西園@「では、その正義の味方がわたしにボールをぶつけたのですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Then, those allies of justice were the ones who hit me with the ball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Then, those allies of justice were the ones who hit me with the ball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは、本当にごめん…」
を片手に広げ、西園さんがサンドイッチを食べている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was eating a sandwich with one hand while holding a book in the other.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was eating a sandwich with one hand while holding a book in the other.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ご飯食べながら本を読むのも、行儀が悪いって言うんじゃないかなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Isn't it poor manners to read a book while eating?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Isn't it poor manners to read a book while eating?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「サンドイッチは、二百年ほど前にイギリスのサンドイッチ伯爵がポーカーを中断する手間を惜しんで、カードを広げながら昼食をとれるようにと考え出したものなんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The sandwich was invented 200 years ago in England by the Earl of Sandwich, who hated taking breaks while playing poker, so he could eat while holding cards in his other hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The sandwich was invented 200 years ago in England by the Earl of Sandwich, who hated taking breaks while playing poker, so he could eat while holding cards in his other hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「だから、わたしはその伯爵に敬意を表して、本を読みながらサンドイッチを食べるんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝So in honor of him, I'm eating a sandwich while reading a book.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝So in honor of him, I'm eating a sandwich while reading a book.❞

MESSAGE.JP: もっともらしい理屈に聞こえるけれど。
理樹@「じゃあ、もしおにぎりだったらどうするの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, what if you were eating onigiri?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, what if you were eating onigiri?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「おにぎりは、鬼桐男爵が考え出したものです。江戸時代、男爵が$K23花札$K0を中断する手間を惜しんで考え出したのがおにぎりです。だから、いいんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Onigiri was invented by Baron Onigiri in the Edo period who hated taking breaks while playing $K23flower cards$K0. So it's okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Onigiri was invented by Baron Onigiri in the Edo period who hated taking breaks while playing $K23flower cards$K0. So it's okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「江戸時代に爵位制度はないと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think there was a title system in the Edo period.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think there was a title system in the Edo period.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れだけ、ツッコんでみた。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the only thing I said.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the only thing I said.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「直枝さんも、いかがですか？」
弁当箱の中から、手作りだというサンドイッチをひとつ、僕に向けて差し出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She took a hand-made sandwich from her lunch box and presented it to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took a hand-made sandwich from her lunch box and presented it to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「えっ？」
西園@「…パンの耳だけでは、申し訳ないですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I can't have you eating only bread crusts.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I can't have you eating only bread crusts.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ンチボックスの中には、西園さん手作りのサンドイッチと彩りの野菜が入ってる。
MESSAGE.EN: Inside her lunch box were sandwiches and a multi-colored salad.
MESSAGE.Translation: Inside her lunch box were sandwiches and a multi-colored salad.

MESSAGE.JP: だ半分くらい、残っていた。

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「それに…少し作りすぎてしまったみたいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Besides... It looks like I made a bit too much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Besides... It looks like I made a bit too much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「食べていただけないと、残すことになってしまいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If you don't help yourself to some, there'll be leftovers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If you don't help yourself to some, there'll be leftovers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「わたしは、もったいないおばけに恨まれたくはありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I don't want to get on the bad side of the Leftover Monster.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I don't want to get on the bad side of the Leftover Monster.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…今晩、眠れない夜を過ごしたら、直枝さんのせいですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...If I can't sleep tonight, it'll be your fault, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...If I can't sleep tonight, it'll be your fault, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、じゃあ、ひとつ」
直、パンの耳だけではちょっと物足りないので、この申し出はありがたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: To be honest, I wasn't particularly happy about eating bread crusts either, so I was grateful for the offer.
MESSAGE.Translation: To be honest, I wasn't particularly happy about eating bread crusts either, so I was grateful for the offer.

MESSAGE.JP: 口サイズに切られたパンに挟まれているのは、ハムとレタス。辛子混じりのマヨネーズが効いていて、かなりおいしい。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a bite and realized it was a ham sandwich with lettuce. A combination of mayonnaise and mustard went well with it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a bite and realized it was a ham sandwich with lettuce. A combination of mayonnaise and mustard went well with it.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごちそうさま」
局、残っていた分のほとんどを食べてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: I ended up eating most of what she had left.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ended up eating most of what she had left.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「とても、おいしかったよ」
西園@「いえ、お粗末様でした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It was nothing great, but thank you for your words.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It was nothing great, but thank you for your words.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…これは、ちょっと謙遜です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Is what I must say in the name of modesty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Is what I must say in the name of modesty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ねえ、西園さん」
は恭介から言われていたことを思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I recalled what Kyousuke had told me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recalled what Kyousuke had told me.

う違う違うっ。
るぶると首を振る。
ンバー集めだ。

MESSAGE.EN: I doubted she'd be good at sports, but she might still enjoy hanging out with us.
MESSAGE.Translation: I doubted she'd be good at sports, but she might still enjoy hanging out with us.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一緒に正義の味方、リトルバスターズをやらない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Would you like to become an ally of justice; a member of the Little Busters?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Would you like to become an ally of justice; a member of the Little Busters?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉に、西園さんが顔をあげる。
MESSAGE.EN: She raised her head at my words.
MESSAGE.Translation: She raised her head at my words.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「かなり恥ずかしい名前ですね」
否定はできない。
西園@「…リトルバスターズ、ですか」
理樹@「うん、リトルバスターズ。今は野球をやってるんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, Little Busters. We're playing baseball right now, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, Little Busters. We're playing baseball right now, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まだ人数が足りないんだ…」
うだ。
ンバー集めだ。
きみのちからが必要なんだ）
おれたちといっしょにきてくれ）
園さんが――。
の輪の中に加わる姿を、見たいと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to see her join this circle.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to see her join this circle.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よかったら、僕らと一緒に野球やらない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you don't mind, would you like to play baseball with us?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you don't mind, would you like to play baseball with us?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ボールをぶつける正義の味方、ですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝With the allies of justice who hit me with the ball, you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝With the allies of justice who hit me with the ball, you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは、その…ほら、済んだ過去は水に流してさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That is, well um... Come on, let bygones be bygones.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That is, well um... Come on, let bygones be bygones.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「普通、その言葉は加害者の言うものではないと思いますが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The perpetrator is not the one who has the right to say that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The perpetrator is not the one who has the right to say that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れから、少し考える時間があった。
MESSAGE.EN: Then, she fell into thought for a moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, she fell into thought for a moment.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「野球ですか…」
西園@「それは…興味深いかも知れません」
理樹@「だったら、今からでもやらない？」
西園@「ですが…」
みが消える。
MESSAGE.EN: The smile vanished from her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: The smile vanished from her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「お断りします」
理樹@「どうして、きっと楽しいよ？」
だって、あたしが楽しいのだから）
きっと、きみも楽しいと思う）
MESSAGE.EN: (I'm sure you'll find it fun as well.)
MESSAGE.Translation: (I'm sure you'll find it fun as well.)

MESSAGE.JP: れは…。
つだったか、僕が聞いた言葉だ。
MESSAGE.EN: When those words were spoken to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: When those words were spoken to me.

MESSAGE.JP: は、差し出されたその手を握った。
MESSAGE.EN: I took the hand that was held out to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took the hand that was held out to me.

MESSAGE.JP: も、西園さんは――。
西園@「わたしが体育をいつも休んでいるのはご存じですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Didn't you know that I'm always excused from gym class?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Didn't you know that I'm always excused from gym class?❞

MESSAGE.JP: うだった。
園さんは常に日向を避けて、陰の中にいた。
MESSAGE.EN: She always avoids sunny places, always sticking to the shade.
MESSAGE.Translation: She always avoids sunny places, always sticking to the shade.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん、知ってる」
西園@「そういう訳ですので、せっかくのお誘いですが遠慮させていただきます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's why, even though you've invited me, I must still decline.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's why, even though you've invited me, I must still decline.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そう…」
ぜだろう。
段の僕なら、ここで引いてしまうのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Normally, I'd have given up by now, but this once I still tried to persuade her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Normally, I'd have given up by now, but this once I still tried to persuade her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「西園さんは体が弱いの？　いつも日傘を差しているけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, do you have a weak body? You're always carrying that parasol.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, do you have a weak body? You're always carrying that parasol.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ち入ったことを訊いているのは分かっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I knew I was prying into private matters.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew I was prying into private matters.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、学校を休むことはないよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, you never take time off from school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, you never take time off from school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、僕は手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, I continued to hold out my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, I continued to hold out my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「この前も…」
も、西園さんは僕の質問には答えない。
MESSAGE.EN: But she didn't answer my question.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she didn't answer my question.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「本のことを訊きましたね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝When you asked me about the book.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝When you asked me about the book.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…あの時と同じ言葉をお返しします」
西園@「いつか、もう一度訊いてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝One day, ask me one more time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝One day, ask me one more time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「もし、わたしが答えても良いと思ったら返事をしますから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If I think it's appropriate to answer, I will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If I think it's appropriate to answer, I will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ただ…」
く言葉は小さい声で、本当にそう言ったのかは自信がない。
MESSAGE.EN: She continued to speak in such a quiet voice, I wasn't sure that she'd really said anything at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: She continued to speak in such a quiet voice, I wasn't sure that she'd really said anything at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「そんな時は来ないと思いますが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I don't think that time will ever come.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I don't think that time will ever come.❞

MESSAGE.JP: して、本に目を戻してしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: She returned her eyes to the book.
MESSAGE.Translation: She returned her eyes to the book.

MESSAGE.JP: り切れた薄い緑の表紙の本。この前と同じ本みたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a worn-out book with a subdued green cover. It looked like the same book from before.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a worn-out book with a subdued green cover. It looked like the same book from before.

MESSAGE.JP: 庫本に視線を落とし、沈黙を保っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned her eyes back down to the book and resumed reading it in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned her eyes back down to the book and resumed reading it in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: 絶されたわけではないと思うけど、これ以上はさすがに嫌がられるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It wasn't like she'd turned me down cold, but I didn't think she'd want me to pry any further.
MESSAGE.Translation: It wasn't like she'd turned me down cold, but I didn't think she'd want me to pry any further.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、僕は練習に行くけど…」
理樹@「もしよかったら、一度見に来てよ。みんなも歓迎してくれると思うから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you like, come watch our practice some time. I think everyone'll be glad to see you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you like, come watch our practice some time. I think everyone'll be glad to see you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: えはなかったけど、きっと聞いてくれていると思った。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't reply, but I'm sure she heard me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't reply, but I'm sure she heard me.

MESSAGE.JP: ンバー探しは失敗に終わったけど、そろそろみんなと合流しようかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: My attempt to find new members had ended in failure, but it was about time to meet up with everyone else...
MESSAGE.Translation: My attempt to find new members had ended in failure, but it was about time to meet up with everyone else...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よーし、ほふく前進なら負けないぞー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, I won't lose to you at crawling!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, I won't lose to you at crawling!❞

MESSAGE.JP: も真人と並んで、ほふく前進を始める。
MESSAGE.EN: I lined up with him and began to crawl.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lined up with him and began to crawl.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おおっ、ノリノリだな、理樹めっ…くそぅ、負けるかよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ooh, you're in a good mood, Riki... Crap, I'm not gonna lose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ooh, you're in a good mood, Riki... Crap, I'm not gonna lose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ふっ…ふっ…」
理樹@「ふっ…ふっ…」
たり、黙々と廊下を這って進んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: We continued crawling down the hall in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: We continued crawling down the hall in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: 女生徒@「きゃっ」
中、通りかかった女子生徒が壁に張りつくようにして引いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: A female student we met on the way clung to the wall upon seeing us.
MESSAGE.Translation: A female student we met on the way clung to the wall upon seeing us.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ふっ…ふっ…オレはこっちだが、おまえは？」
理樹@「ふっ…ふっ…僕はね…」
理樹@「この辺りで探すよ」
真人@「じゃあ、ここまでだな。じゃあな、楽しかったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's it then. See you later, it was fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's it then. See you later, it was fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ふっ…ふっ…」
人はそのまままっすぐに這っていった。
理樹@「ふぅ…」
は立ち上がり、普通に歩き始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up and began walking normally.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up and began walking normally.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「中庭にいくよ」
真人@「じゃあ、ここまでだな。じゃあな、楽しかったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's it then. See you later, it was fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's it then. See you later, it was fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ふっ…ふっ…」
人はそのまままっすぐに這っていった。
理樹@「ふぅ…」
は立ち上がり、普通に歩き始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood up and began walking normally.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood up and began walking normally.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（えーと…）
りを見回す。
理樹@「…とは言ったものの…特に当てはないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'm not really sure where to go though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm not really sure where to go though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 下を歩いていると、見知った人物に遭遇した。
MESSAGE.EN: While walking along the hallway, I ran into someone I knew.
MESSAGE.Translation: While walking along the hallway, I ran into someone I knew.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…あのね」
は額に指を突きながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: I said, poking her forehead with my finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said, poking her forehead with my finger.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何してるの？」
？？？@「さて、私は誰でしょう？」
理樹@「三枝、葉留佳」
？？？@「うん、正解です」
三枝@「やは、理樹くん。放課後のお散歩？」
は溜息を吐く。
理樹@「…三枝さん、どうして自分で自分に目隠しをして立ってるわけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Saigusa-san, tell me why you're covering your own eyes with your own hands?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Saigusa-san, tell me why you're covering your own eyes with your own hands?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「『私は誰でしょうゲーム』？」
首をかしげながら三枝さんは言う。
うしてこの子はいつも疑問に疑問形で答えるのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Why is she always answering questions with questions?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why is she always answering questions with questions?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そのゲームは自分以外の誰かの目を塞いでからするものなのっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You're supposed to cover someone else's eyes in that game!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You're supposed to cover someone else's eyes in that game!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「おおぅ」
理樹@「そこで今まで生きてて知らなかった！　っていう顔しないっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't make a face like you've lived until now without even knowing that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't make a face like you've lived until now without even knowing that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「いや、隠してたらわかんないじゃん？　私ほら地味だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Well, if I cover my eyes, you can't tell who I am, right? You know, since I'm so plain after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Well, if I cover my eyes, you can't tell who I am, right? You know, since I'm so plain after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「全然まったくもってそんなことないよ」
三枝@「へぇ」
枝さんは腕組みをすると感心したように頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She folded her arms and, as if impressed, nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She folded her arms and, as if impressed, nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「理樹くんはスゴイね」
理樹@「全然すごくないよ」
体その特徴的なツーテールを誰が見間違えると言うのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: And actually, is she trying to say anyone could mistake those distinctive twin-tails of hers?
MESSAGE.Translation: And actually, is she trying to say anyone could mistake those distinctive twin-tails of hers?

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「私の尊敬する人並みにスゴイよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝You're as amazing as the other people I respect.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝You're as amazing as the other people I respect.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…三枝さんの尊敬するひと？　どんなひと？」
三枝@「尊敬するひとの名前はねぇ」
三枝@「ミスター・ジョージと、ゴードン・シャムウェイかな～」
ごく嬉しそうに言う三枝さん。多分本当に尊敬しているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She was positively beaming. Those must've been people she really respected.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was positively beaming. Those must've been people she really respected.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ていうか、誰？」
三枝@「いやー、ジョージとゴードンはスゴイよ、なんと言ってもスゴイよジョージとゴードン」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Well, George and Gordon are amazing, no matter what you say they're just amazing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Well, George and Gordon are amazing, no matter what you say they're just amazing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは頷いている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was nodding to her own words.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was nodding to her own words.

MESSAGE.JP: 変わらず僕の話を聞いてないしっ。
MESSAGE.EN: She wasn't listening to me at all, as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wasn't listening to me at all, as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: ょうがないので話題を戻した。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no other choice but to return to the previous topic.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no other choice but to return to the previous topic.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ひとりで目隠しゲーム？」
三枝@「さっきから誰か通らないかなー、と思って立ってたんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I was starting to wonder if no one was going to pass by, already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I was starting to wonder if no one was going to pass by, already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「誰も通らないんだよねー」
三枝@「まぁ、理樹くんが通ってくれたからよしとするよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝But then you passed by, Riki-kun, so now I'm happy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝But then you passed by, Riki-kun, so now I'm happy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろ手を組んで、三枝さんはぴょんぴょんジャンプした。
MESSAGE.EN: She folded her arms behind her and began hopping.
MESSAGE.Translation: She folded her arms behind her and began hopping.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「喜びのダンス」
理樹@「踊らなくていいから。誰も踊れと言ってないからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No need to dance. Nobody asked you to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No need to dance. Nobody asked you to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: して解説も求めてない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't even ask for an explanation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't even ask for an explanation.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「本当脈絡ないなぁ…」
三枝@「ありがとぉぅっ」
理樹@「誉めてないよっ！」
理樹@「はぁ…っ。話が進まないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ha... We're not getting anywhere like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ha... We're not getting anywhere like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「やはは。ごめんごめん」
三枝@「誰か、探してるの？」
理樹@「探してるといえば探してるね」
三枝@「むむぅ？」
理樹@「あ。そうだ。三枝さん」
三枝@「うん？」
理樹@「…野球、やってみない？」
理樹@「というわけで、メンバーを連れてきてみました…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And that's how I brought along another member...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And that's how I brought along another member...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「理樹、オレの言葉を覚えているか」
理樹@「え、なんだっけ」
真人@「オレも忘れた」
鈴@「アホだな」
真人@「けどな、少なくとも、こんな役立たずを連れてこいなんて言ってはいないはずだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But I'm sure I never told you to bring someone so useless along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But I'm sure I never told you to bring someone so useless along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、そんなこと言っちゃダメだよ、真人…」
三枝@「やはは、ヤクタタズーゥー！」
真人@「三枝、オレを指差してるんじゃねぇっ」
真人@「役に立たなさそうなのは、おまえだっつーの」
理樹@「…とりあえずいつものテストをしようよ。するんだよね、恭介？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...How about we have her take the test like usual. What do you say, Kyousuke?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...How about we have her take the test like usual. What do you say, Kyousuke?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「理樹…」
理樹@「な、なに恭介？」
恭介@「特技はあるのか、コイツには」
理樹@「あるの？　三枝さん」
はグラウンドにしゃがみこんでいる三枝さんに訊いてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked Saigusa-san, who was squatting down on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked Saigusa-san, who was squatting down on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「って、何してるのさ」
枝さんはグローブを持って匂いを嗅いでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was holding a glove in her hand, sniffing it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was holding a glove in her hand, sniffing it.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「青春の匂いだー」
恭介@「合格！」
理樹@「えぇっ！　何が!?　何が合格したの恭介!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh! What!? What did she pass, Kyousuke!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh! What!? What did she pass, Kyousuke!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえ、もう誰でもいいだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You don't care who it is at all anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You don't care who it is at all anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ぶっちゃけるな、鈴」
真人@「ぶ…ぶっちゃけやがった…」
理樹@「じゃ、じゃあとりあえずキャッチボールから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W, well, let's play catch for starters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W, well, let's play catch for starters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…念のためだけど、ボールはグローブで取るんだよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Just to make sure, you use the glove to catch the ball, okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Just to make sure, you use the glove to catch the ball, okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「どこ当てると１０点？」
理樹@「ストラックアウトじゃないよっ！」
理樹@「恭介も何ベニヤ板にコンパスで円を描いてるのさっ！　的当てでもないよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And you Kyousuke, what're you drawing circles for!? We don't need a target.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And you Kyousuke, what're you drawing circles for!? We don't need a target.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そうじゃなくって、普通にこう、ボールを投げ合うんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That's not what it's about, you just throw and catch the ball normally.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That's not what it's about, you just throw and catch the ball normally.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「つまり、キャッチボールをすればいいんだねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝So, we just have to play catch?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝So, we just have to play catch?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうそう」
いうか最初にキャッチボールをしようって僕言ってるんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, isn't that exactly what I said in the first place...
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, isn't that exactly what I said in the first place...

MESSAGE.JP: 当に人の話を聞かない子だ。
MESSAGE.EN: She really never listens to anyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: She really never listens to anyone.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「んー…」
枝さんはぐるぐると腕を回している。
三枝@「ほい」
ょろーん。ぱすん。
三枝@「こんな感じ？」
理樹@「う、うん。そんな感じ」
うにも力の抜けた投げ方をするなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: She's got a really weak throw...
MESSAGE.Translation: She's got a really weak throw...

MESSAGE.JP: の子だからかな。そんなことに気がついて僕はなんだか微笑ましくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: But she's a girl after all. I smiled sympathetically after realizing that.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she's a girl after all. I smiled sympathetically after realizing that.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ハエがとまりそうな球だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝The ball was so slow, a fly could stop it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝The ball was so slow, a fly could stop it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「やっぱり役立たずじゃねぇか」
三枝@「んー…」
ょろーん。ぱすん。
は三枝さんの球を投げ返しながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: I spoke throwing the ball back to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I spoke throwing the ball back to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こんなものじゃない？」
みたいな女の子のほうが珍しいのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: A girl like Rin must be pretty rare.
MESSAGE.Translation: A girl like Rin must be pretty rare.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「んー…」
恭介@「えーと、三枝」
三枝@「んー、あ、はい、ええと、何です？　棗せんぱい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Mm, ah, yes? Um... What is it, Natsume-senpai?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Mm, ah, yes? Um... What is it, Natsume-senpai?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なんだか投げ辛そうだな」
三枝@「はい。ちょっとだけですけど」
介は考え込むと、地面に転がっているグローブを幾つか手に取った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke gave it some thought and then picked up a few gloves lying on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke gave it some thought and then picked up a few gloves lying on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…ほれ、三枝」
三枝@「わっ…っと、とと」
枝さんが恭介の投げたグローブを受け取る。
MESSAGE.EN: She caught the glove Kyousuke threw to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She caught the glove Kyousuke threw to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「填めてみろ…右手にな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Try it on... On your right hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Try it on... On your right hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「了解です………おお。おー？」
スパス、と三枝さんは左の拳をグローブにぶつけている。
MESSAGE.EN: She smacked the glove with her left fist.
MESSAGE.Translation: She smacked the glove with her left fist.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「バッチリ指が入るよー」
恭介@「つまり…」
介は三枝さんがさっき填めていたグローブを手に取りながら言った。
MESSAGE.EN: He picked up the glove Saigusa-san had used earlier and spoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: He picked up the glove Saigusa-san had used earlier and spoke.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「これは右利き用。つまり、左手に填める」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝This one's for right-handed people. In other words, you wear it on your left hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝This one's for right-handed people. In other words, you wear it on your left hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「三枝が今つけたのは、左利き用」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The glove you just put on is for lefties.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The glove you just put on is for lefties.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…三枝は左利きなんだな」
三枝@「うん。そうだよ…じゃなくって、そうですよ、棗せんぱい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Yep, that's it... I mean, yes, you're correct, Natsume-senpai.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Yep, that's it... I mean, yes, you're correct, Natsume-senpai.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「もう一度、投げてみろ」
三枝@「アイアイサー！」
三枝@「よっ！」
三枝@「はっ！」
三枝@「とりゃっ！」
三枝@「そいやーっ！」
理樹@「いきなりフォームが普通になったね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You returned to your normal form all of a sudden, huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You returned to your normal form all of a sudden, huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「グローブにも左利き用があるんだねー。知らなかったなぁ、私」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝So, there're gloves for lefties too. I didn't know that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝So, there're gloves for lefties too. I didn't know that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そりゃあるよ。有名野球選手にも左利きは沢山いるし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course there are. There's a ton of famous baseball players who are lefties.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course there are. There's a ton of famous baseball players who are lefties.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ということは、戦力だな」
介は頷いた。
ゃららららーん。
三枝@「三枝葉留佳はヤクタタズからジョブチェンジした！」
ぜかファンファーレが鳴った。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason a fanfare played.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason a fanfare played.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんか華麗にジョブチェンジされたーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Somehow, wasn't that a magnificent job change!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Somehow, wasn't that a magnificent job change!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: っくりと膝を突く真人。
三枝@「ふっふっふ、真人くん、私はもうヤクタタズではないのですヨっ！」
理樹@「…三枝さん、ボールが飛んできたあとどうすればいいか知ってる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Saigusa-san, you know what you have to do when the ball comes flying to you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Saigusa-san, you know what you have to do when the ball comes flying to you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「え？　打ったひとに当てればいいんでしょ？　こうやって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Eh? You have to hit the person that threw it at you, right? Like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Eh? You have to hit the person that threw it at you, right? Like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ん。
すっ。
人の股間に当たる。
MESSAGE.EN: The ball hit Masato in the crotch.
MESSAGE.Translation: The ball hit Masato in the crotch.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ぐぉぅ…」
沈。
三枝@「違うの？」
理樹@「全然違う！」
とりあえず、ルールを覚えてもらおう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...We should start by having her memorize the rules.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...We should start by having her memorize the rules.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「じゃ、三枝は、外野の守備な。続きは放課後だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, Saigusa, you'll play outfield defense. We'll continue after school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, Saigusa, you'll play outfield defense. We'll continue after school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「アイアイサ～」
恭介@「バトルのほうも、人数が増えて賑やかになってきたな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The number of people in the battle ranking system has increased too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The number of people in the battle ranking system has increased too.❞

んな頑張って練習した。

。ガコン。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You want to recommend it for others? You should drink it yourself first.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You mean it happened this time last year?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It was quite an amazing way to get it out.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝That's why today is Anego's Day. Anego, Anego.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's fine even if you don't repeat my name so much, Haruka-kun.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Why are you asking me? Haruka-kun's the one calling me that.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Saigusa-san, why do you call Kurugaya-san Anego?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: ❛What's so hard to understand?❜, she seemed to be asking.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It'd be just strange to call her Aneki or Anesan or Onee-san, right?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, there are some people who call me that.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝No, no, Anego is Anego, that's why Anego.❞
