MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't get it at all though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't get it at all though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「少年、解らないから哲学なのさ。解ってしまったら哲学者はそこで廃業だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, it's philosophical so long as one doesn't understand it. It is no longer a philosophy if you understand it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Young man, it's philosophical so long as one doesn't understand it. It is no longer a philosophy if you understand it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「世の中に完全なる解答など存在しないものなのだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝There's no such thing as a perfect answer in this world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝There's no such thing as a perfect answer in this world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんが缶を放り投げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She tossed the juice can away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She tossed the juice can away.

MESSAGE.JP: らん、と軽快な音がして空き缶はゴミ箱に吸い込まれた。
MESSAGE.EN: It landed in the garbage can with a small clank.
MESSAGE.Translation: It landed in the garbage can with a small clank.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「さて、と。私はそろそろ行くが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Now, then. It's about time I should go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Now, then. It's about time I should go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「あ、了解です。姉御。引き留めてすまんこってす」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah, understood. Sorry for holding you up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah, understood. Sorry for holding you up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「うむ、まあ気にするな」
ヶ谷さんは髪の毛を翻して歩き去った。
MESSAGE.EN: She flipped her hair over her shoulder and walked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She flipped her hair over her shoulder and walked away.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「一度ね」
理樹@「え？」
三枝@「姉御を『姉御』以外の呼び方をしたら怒られましたヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I called her something other than Anego, and she got angry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I called her something other than Anego, and she got angry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんはぽつり、と言葉を漏らした。
三枝@「だから、姉御は姉御以外の姉御であるだけで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝That's why Anego is Anego, even if she isn't my Anego...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝That's why Anego is Anego, even if she isn't my Anego...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「姉御と呼ぶワケなのですな。うん」
理樹@「…哲学的だね」
はさっきの来ヶ谷さんの言葉を繰り返した。確かに解答なんてなさそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I repeated what Kurugaya-san said before. There certainly didn't seem to be a perfect answer to that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I repeated what Kurugaya-san said before. There certainly didn't seem to be a perfect answer to that.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ところで、理樹くん」
理樹@「あ、うん？　何？」
三枝@「一つお願いがあるんだけど」
三枝@「聞いてくれる？」
理樹@「い、いきなり何？　僕ができる範囲なら聞くけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's this all of a sudden? I'll do what I can...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's this all of a sudden? I'll do what I can...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「そろそろ私のことを名前で呼んで欲しいのですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I want you to start calling me by my name soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I want you to start calling me by my name soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　名前って…例えば？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Your name... Like what for example?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Your name... Like what for example?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「例えば、うぅむ」
枝さんは考え込んだ。
の指を折りながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She started counting out on the fingers of her left hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started counting out on the fingers of her left hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「例えば、はるちゃんとか」
三枝@「例えば、はるちんとか」
三枝@「例えば、はーたんとか」
理樹@「…よー、はーたん」
三枝@「えぇっ!?　よりによって何故それなんデスカ!?」
理樹@「冗談だよ、冗談…でも」
三枝@「…私のこと、名前で呼ぶのが、嫌？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...You don't want to use my name?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...You don't want to use my name?❞

MESSAGE.JP: も、ちょっと唐突な、とちらりとよぎった思考は、僕を覗き込む三枝さんの視線のせいで途切れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was cut off by Saigusa-san's intense glare as I was about to suggest that it was a bit too sudden.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was cut off by Saigusa-san's intense glare as I was about to suggest that it was a bit too sudden.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「い、いやじゃないよ。というか、三枝さんがそうしてほしいっていうなら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not like I don't want to. Well, since that's what you want, Saigusa-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not like I don't want to. Well, since that's what you want, Saigusa-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ホントっ!?　良かった！」
枝さんは僕の手を掴むと、ぶんぶん、と上下に振った。
MESSAGE.EN: She seized my hand and pumped it up and down.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seized my hand and pumped it up and down.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ありがとぅっ、理樹くんっ」
理樹@「そ、それぐらい大したことじゃないよ…」
三枝@「思い切って言って良かった。うんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I'm glad I spoke my mind. Yep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I'm glad I spoke my mind. Yep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは嬉しそうだった。
三枝@「あ、そういえば、呼び出しの時間何時だっけ…わぁ、過ぎちゃってるよーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah, now that I think of it, when was I supposed to... Whoa, I'm already this late!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah, now that I think of it, when was I supposed to... Whoa, I'm already this late!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「じゃ、もう行くから。ごめんねっ」
理樹@「う、うん」
う一度ぶんぶん、腕を振ったあと、三枝さんはぱっと、手を離して駆けだした。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook my hand one last time and suddenly broke off and dashed away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook my hand one last time and suddenly broke off and dashed away.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、ぴた、といきなり止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: But she suddenly stopped before getting too far.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she suddenly stopped before getting too far.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「言い忘れてた。あのね、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I forgot to tell you, Riki-kun, you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I forgot to tell you, Riki-kun, you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「名前を呼んで欲しい理由はね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝The reason I wanted you to call me by my first name is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝The reason I wanted you to call me by my first name is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「私は名字より、名前のほうが、好きだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I like it more than my last name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I like it more than my last name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「それだけの理由だからねっ」
理樹@「そ、そうなんだ…」
三枝@「うん。そーなのっ」
三枝@「であ！　またねーっ」
っという間に三枝さん、いや、葉留佳さんは校舎の角に消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: In the blink of an eye, Saigusa-san, no, Haruka-san rounded the corner and disappeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the blink of an eye, Saigusa-san, no, Haruka-san rounded the corner and disappeared.

MESSAGE.JP: また戻ってきた。
葉留佳@「忘れてた!!　はいこれ!!」
理樹@「え」
ジュースをひとつ渡される。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed me the juice can.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed me the juice can.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやこれみそカツ…」
葉留佳@「じゃーねーっ！」
び校舎の角に消えていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Once again she disappeared around the corner of the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once again she disappeared around the corner of the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしろっていうのさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What am I supposed to do with this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What am I supposed to do with this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず、すごい味だった…。
、携帯電話で時間を確認する。
MESSAGE.EN: I checked the time on my cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I checked the time on my cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: 飯までまだ時間はあるけどどうしようかな。
MESSAGE.EN: There's still time before dinner, what to do...
MESSAGE.Translation: There's still time before dinner, what to do...

MESSAGE.JP: 屋に戻って休んでおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll go back to my room and rest...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll go back to my room and rest...

MESSAGE.JP: 食後、僕は鈴とふたりでひとりの男子生徒の元を訪ねていた。
MESSAGE.EN: After dinner I went to look for the designated boy with Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: After dinner I went to look for the designated boy with Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: が唯一知る２−Ａ組の男子生徒だ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was only one guy I knew in class 2-A.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was only one guy I knew in class 2-A.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「えーとだな…出席番号一番の男子の部屋を教えてほしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Um... Please tell us what room the guy who's first on your class attendance list lives in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Um... Please tell us what room the guy who's first on your class attendance list lives in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の準備をしてきただけある。知らない相手でもちゃんと目を見て話をできた。
MESSAGE.EN: She came mentally prepared, so she could even talk directly to someone she didn't know.
MESSAGE.Translation: She came mentally prepared, so she could even talk directly to someone she didn't know.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子@「一番は…相川くんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝The first one? That should be Aikawa-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝The first one? That should be Aikawa-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: らない人相手に、僕の後ろに隠れるように立つ鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She hid behind my back, being afraid to face the stranger.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hid behind my back, being afraid to face the stranger.

MESSAGE.JP: から言おうか？と訊くと、ちりんと頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked if I should do the talking, and she nodded in return.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked if I should do the talking, and she nodded in return.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「悪いけど、出席番号一番の男子の部屋を教えてくれない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, but could you tell me what room the guy who's first on your class attendance list lives in?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, but could you tell me what room the guy who's first on your class attendance list lives in?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子@「一番は…相川くんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝The first one? That should be Aikawa-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝The first one? That should be Aikawa-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「常に一番っぽい苗字だな、可哀相だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝His name sounds like he's always the first one on a checklist, poor thing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝His name sounds like he's always the first one on a checklist, poor thing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 想だけ後ろから聞こえてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice came from behind my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice came from behind my back.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子@「角曲がって突き当たりのひとつ手前だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Boy@❝Turn the corner, and you'll find his room at the end of the hall.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Boy@❝Turn the corner, and you'll find his room at the end of the hall.❞

MESSAGE.JP: りがとう、と頭を下げて、廊下を進む。
MESSAGE.EN: We bowed our thanks and headed down the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: We bowed our thanks and headed down the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: えてもらった部屋の前に立ち、ノックをする。
MESSAGE.EN: We stood in front of the indicated room and knocked on the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: We stood in front of the indicated room and knocked on the door.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「はい…」
ょろっとした男子生徒が戸口に現れる。
MESSAGE.EN: A male student appeared at the doorway.
MESSAGE.Translation: A male student appeared at the doorway.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえが相川か？」
男子生徒@「え、はあ…」
鈴@「話があるんだがいいか？」
相川@「はあ、大丈夫ですけど」
相川@「わざわざ棗さんがなんの用でしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝What business could you have with me, Natsume-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝What business could you have with me, Natsume-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんだ、あたしの知り合いだったのか？」
相川@「いや、名前ぐらい知ってますよ」
相川@「こっちは直枝さんですよね」
を見て言う。
理樹@「ええ」
鈴@「なんで知ってるんだ？　なんか有名人みたいだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝How did you know? It's like we're famous or something...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝How did you know? It's like we're famous or something...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、あれだけ真人たちが騒いでたら有名にもなるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I guess we would be a bit famous, what with Masato and the rest always causing a commotion...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I guess we would be a bit famous, what with Masato and the rest always causing a commotion...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あいつのせいか？」
理樹@「いや、それを蹴り倒してる鈴の行動もだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it's partly because you're always kicking him down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it's partly because you're always kicking him down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうか…」
鈴@「今後はなるたけ気をつけよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'll be more careful from now on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'll be more careful from now on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相川@「それで、なんの用でしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝So, what business do you have with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝So, what business do you have with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 川さんがそう繰り返した。
鈴@「同じ２年だ、そう固くなるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We're both second years, don't be so stiff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We're both second years, don't be so stiff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相川@「オッケ。で、なんの用？」
理樹@「相川くんだよね？」
男子生徒@「え、はあ…」
理樹@「ちょっと話があるんだけどいい？」
男子生徒@「はあ、大丈夫ですけど」
てお手伝いはここまでかな。
MESSAGE.EN: All right, that should be enough help.
MESSAGE.Translation: All right, that should be enough help.

MESSAGE.JP: はどうぞ、とどいて鈴に続きは任せてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I stepped back, leaving the rest to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stepped back, leaving the rest to Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえが相川か…」
男子生徒@「はあ…」
鈴@「ふん…手を煩わせてくれたな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Humph... You caused us quite some trouble.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Humph... You caused us quite some trouble.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんで悪役みたいに入るの」
理樹@「ほら、訊きたいこと訊こうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Come on, you had something to ask.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Come on, you had something to ask.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なりに緊張してるのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: This was probably her way of coping with her nervousness.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was probably her way of coping with her nervousness.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「常に出席簿、一番だろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're first on the attendance list, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're first on the attendance list, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相川@「はぁ」
相川@「…それだけを訊くために？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝...Is that all you wanted to know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝...Is that all you wanted to know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「んなわけないだろ」
、これでよく嫌われないなあ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin, it's amazing people don't hate you with that attitude.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin, it's amazing people don't hate you with that attitude.

MESSAGE.JP: いうか、このぶっきらぼうな態度で男子にそこそこ人気あるから、女子には結構嫌われてるんだっけか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, that brusque attitude of hers was fairly popular among the guys, while girls seemed to hate her for it...
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, that brusque attitude of hers was fairly popular among the guys, while girls seemed to hate her for it...

MESSAGE.JP: の人生は前途多難だな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin has a rocky road ahead in her life...
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin has a rocky road ahead in her life...

MESSAGE.JP: 相川@「わざわざ棗さんがなんの用でしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Aikawa@❝What kind of business could you have with me, Natsume-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Aikawa@❝What kind of business could you have with me, Natsume-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんだ、あたしの知り合いだったのか？」
相川@「いや、名前ぐらい知ってますよ」
相川@「こっちは直枝さんですよね」
を見て言う。
理樹@「ええ」
鈴@「そうか、なんか有名人みたいでヤだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I see, it's like we're famous or something...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I see, it's like we're famous or something...❞
